During my childhood I had many road trips through southern Peru where I got to know my country and its culture.After college I studied business administration at Universidad del Pacífico with the aim of starting my own business one day. And once graduated, I worked at Pizzerias Presto, the company of my parents, where I learned almost everything you need to know to start a business and make it successful.Last year, it was when I decided to venture myself to travel the world for a period of 11 months that allowed me to know myself and to inspire myself to start Qhispikay.°Me encanta viajar e ir aprendiendo en el camino, la primera vez que conocí el Valle Sagrado fue cuando tenía 8 años y simplemente ¡me enamoré!. Durante mi infancia tuve muchos viajes por carretera por el sur del Perú en donde pude conocer mi país y su cultura.después del colegio estudié administración de empresas en la Universidad del Pacífico con el objetivo de emprender mi propio negocio. Y una vez graduada, trabajé en Pizzerias Presto, la empresa de mis papás, en donde aprendí casi todo lo que se necesita saber para poder emprender un negocio y hacer que sea exitoso.Finalmente, el año pasado, fue cuando decidí aventurarme a viajar por el mundo durante un periodo de 11 meses que me permitió conocerme a mi misma e inspirarme para iniciar Qhispikay. Isaias Mendoza del SolarIn 2012 I made the decision to leave my office work in Lima and go out to travel the world investing my savings and time in gaining traveling experiences. Without a doubt the best decision I could have made so far, for the first time I felt really free and I feel that it is in this state that a person can discover and internalize their fears and passions.For me the fear is to let life pass and not try to live dreams and my passion is to work in a sustainable and regenerative development in tourism.The school I studied in Arequipa, I am a professional in business administration from the University of Lima and the last 4 years I work in the tourism sector.°En el 2012 tome la decisión de dejar mi trabajo de oficina en Lima y salir a recorrer el mundo invirtiendo mis ahorros y tiempo en ganar experiencias viajando. Sin duda la mejor decisión que pude haber tomado hasta ahora, por primera ves me sentí realmente libre y siento que es en este estado que una persona puede descubrir e interiorizar sus miedos y pasiones.Para mi el miedo es dejar pasar la vida y no intentar vivir los sueños y mi pasión es trabajar en un desarrollo sostenible y regenerativo en turismo.El colegio lo estudie en Arequipa, soy profesional en administración de empresas por la Universidad de lima y los 4 años trabajo en el sector de turismo.  ​

story:
INTRODUCING THE FIRST FERRY EXCURSION ATTRACTION IN JAMAICA!

Jamaica is a beautiful island, but sometimes it takes forever to experience its widely-spaced attractions by driving for hours each way in a tour bus or taxi! The fastest, safest, and most fun way to truly explore any island is by boat. At Paradise Express Ferry, we like to say:

THE BEST WAY TO GET AROUND IS TO GO AROUND!

We’re committed to crafting an unparalleled experience. Feel the sun on your face and the wind in your hair, or sit inside on airline-style reclining seats, and see more of the island in air conditioned comfort, safety and luxury! We’ve introduced exciting new technologies such as drones for live videos and pictures, and will provide you with FREE broadband Wi-Fi so that you can share your images and experiences in real time via social media! You can't do that while on the road.

This Fast Ferry Excursion service will also be transformational to Jamaica and will start a new industry that will create new employment opportunities and positively impact the lives of more than 150 people we will directly hire and train to world-class standards. After Jamaica, we expect to expand to Cuba, The Caymans, Puerto Rico, St. Maarten, and US/British Virgin Islands.

WE'RE HALF-WAY THERE! WHAT WE'VE ACCOMPLISHED IN PHASE I:

  • We have previously raised and committed half of the $3M million required to launch, and have successfully leased prominent waterfront properties in beautiful Montego Bay and Negril.
  • We have pioneered the concept of integrated drone and Wi-Fi technologies on fast catamaran vessels and are working on a beta-version of our FREE travel App for tourists, which will give you unprecedented information on what to do and where to go while you're on vacation!
  • We have established key relationships with the Caribbean Maritime University and other local partners, and have obtained key approvals and/or licenses from Jamaican regulatory bodies for operating a fast ferry excursion attraction.

PHASE II – RAISING THE REMAINING $1,500,000

Join this grass-roots effort! With a ONE-TIME CONTRIBUTION, you can select an option that gives you UNLIMITED FREE access to our excursions FOR LIFE in some cases! With your participation, we will launch this exciting venture in time for the next Winter's tourism season which starts December 2019! These funds will used to:

  • Work with the Caribbean Maritime University (CMU), to hire and train the initial class of approx. 40 men and women for vessel and shore-side operations. Depending on the Perk selected, your contribution may offset the tuition of a cadet at the CMU, which is approximately $6,500 per year.
  • Obtain a high-speed passenger catamaran ferry capable of accommodating up to 300 passengers.
  • Construct a Floating Dock & Temporary Terminal for our Montego Bay hub of operations.

THE TEAM BEHIND PARADISE EXPRESS

Paradise Express Ferry is pioneering, NY-based company founded in 2012. We are the first MBE-Certified Ferry Operations business in the New York/New Jersey region. That means we may someday operate in NY also! We scored another first by winning an international RFP from Jamaica to develop a novel waterfront tourism project in Montego Bay. In 2017 we became one of only 5 ferry-operations companies that has obtained a license from the US Government to operate to Cuba! Yes, we intend to provide a full-day or overnight excursion from Montego Bay to Santiago, Cuba as one of our earliest expansion plans! Future plans include setting up similar operations in other key Caribbean islands. Find out more on our website!

Paradise Express Ferry was founded by Garry Anthony Johnson, trained as an Architect, and a leading NY Real Estate & Economic Development expert, who has worked on hundreds of complex mixed-use development projects over his 30 year career. He was born in the United Kingdom and lived his early years in Kingston, Jamaica.

Luxury Marketing is being led by Sheri Wilson-Gray, a former Executive Vice President and Chief Marketing Officer for the world-renowned Saks Fifth Avenue luxury retail brand and later, Island Global Yachting.

The Paradise Express team has over 150 years combined experience in Maritime Operations, Marketing, Real Estate & Economic Development, Security, and most of all exemplary Customer Service. We have the knowledge, skills and motivation to be successful while positively impacting lives.

 

EXECUTIVE TEAM

BOARD ADVISORS

Support this campaign by making a one-time contribution or selecting one of the Perks, some of which allow UNLIMITED use of our excursions for LIFE! Never pay again! In supporting this campaign, YOU will be an invaluable part in building Paradise Express Ferry, and support the local team members we will hire to provide you with this experience. Wouldn’t it have been great to have been invited to participate when JetBlue or Carnival launched? It’s not often that people are asked to take part in a company's development, and we’re excited to share the planning for our first launch with YOU!

PROJECT JOURNEY

We have successfully negotiated, leased, and built significant barriers to entry for a transformative and game-changing venture that we feel will be highly successful. Over the next several months our team will resume planning for the infrastructure and operations. We’re so excited and look forward to you being present at the launch in Montego Bay, Jamaica and our operations from December 2019 onwards!

Concept Vessel

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are unable to contribute at any of the Perk Levels, feel free to contribute any dollar amount you're comfortable with using the Back It button.

In addition to your support, we need you to spread the word to your family, friends, and everyone in your personal, professional and social networks. Remind them that our excursions change lives while you're having fun!

Also, please be sure to visit our website, and follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

WELCOME TO PARADISE!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Maya and I am fundraising to go on an awesome camp adventure in Vermont!  Since I am homeschooling I thought it would be a great experience to fundraise for my trip and use my entrepreneurial skills and artistic talents! The camp takes place for one week at the end of September in Vermont. I am fundraising for the cost of the camp, various items I need to participate (sleeping bags, backpack, warm clothes for Vermont fall) in addition to the plane ticket and transportation costs.

Your donations go directly to these costs.I decided to use IndieGoGo to fundraise because it offers a unique perks system, that lets you receive custom “perks” when you donate.  Since I am an artist and cupcake maker, I decided to offer my unique creations as “perks” when you donate. I have put together some amazing artistic perk choices for you to take advantage of.

Your donations will have a huge impact on my homeschool journey. This year I made the decision to homeschool. It has been an incredible experience. I really wanted to participate in something this fall that would allow me be with other homeschooling teens, and also attend a program that would give me a chance to participate in artistic and creative activities. I was so excited when I found Not Back to School Camp! It offers me a chance to make connections with other homeschooling teens and be a part of an amazing community.

The Perks that I am offering are:

$10 $25 $50 $75 $150 $300 or More

Goals and Creative Perks  

My fundraising goal is $1,980. All of your donations go straight to my Vermont Adventure, where I will attend Not Back to School Camp . The funds will  go to tuition costs, equipment, and transportation costs.

When you donate you have a chance to receive my original perks like paintings, pictures I will be taking while at camp in Vermont, and cupcakes (local donations only).

The Impact

Your contribution will go towards my Vermont Adventure where I will attend Not Back to School Camp. It will allow me to connect with other homeschooling teens and build a community that I  can stay connected to forever!

story:
WanderSafe is the world's holistic first solo explorer's safety solution. It was developed by a female global nomad. She met thousands of women and vulnerable people who experienced various forms of violence and assault when traveling and commuting. In uncertain times, where there are situations and information could save your life, we've combined a smart personal safety device an intelligent smartphone app where JENI, your virtual safety concierge, provides you with location-centric travel tips personalized to your travel habits.

The WanderSafe device is discreet -- it can be held in your had and unseen by a potential attacker. Unlike your slick smartphone, it won't attract unwanted attention unless you activate it and you don't have to pray SIRI is able to respond fast enough. The WanderSafe is very simple to operate and is designed to de-escalate a potential unsafety situation as we believe the best confrontation you can have is one you can avoid. Out of the box, you can now walk, run and explore and feel more empowered. 

The one click light on the side is pressed to activate a wide bright lumen light, so you can be enlighted about what might be lurking around you. If it's not your neighbor's cat or a possum on the prowl, a second click of the button emits a disturbing strobe light. This is clinically proven to disorient a potential attacker. If the unsafe moment is continuing, there is a "Twist Top Screamer" that emits a 140-decibel personal alarm meant to attract attention or diffuse the situation. All of these functions can be operated with one hand. WanderSafe is truly help in the palm of your hand! 

JENI is amazing, and we've been developing her over the past two years. She creates a dynamic safety score and makes sure you know where to go and what to avoid.

Your input helps others #GoWanderSafe.

Together, democratising safety!  

The WanderSafe device is a personal alarm that connects to the WanderSafe App on your smartphone.

Features include a wide blinding lumen light at one end for lighting up a potential threat, a second click strobe light to distract a potential assailant and a 140lb personal siren to attract attention. This is activated by a twist motion of the top of the device that is patent pending.

In addition, an activate button notifies three present personal contacts through the app if pressed. Designated emergency contacts are then informed of the user's location using geo-coordinates via Bluetooth.

The WanderSafe device will retail for $79 USD and it will be available worldwide.

WanderSafe has an app that empowers users to navigate their surroundings better and safer. Apple has Siri, Amazon has Alexa, Microsoft has Cortana and WanderSafe has JENI. Our AI tells you exactly what places are dangerous and is packed with safety data from trusted sources including Motorola. Jozu for Women Inc/WanderSafe is a constituent of the US Department of State's OSAC.gov division.

Because we genuinely want to reduce violence against vulnerable people, human trafficking, domestic violence, and assault, we are integrating a Crimestoppers International REPORT button into our next release and you will be able to anonymously report an incident or person to Crimestoppers International through a first of its kind fusion. 

Our Safety Expert in Residence and Senior Security Advisor Thomas Pecora provides curated safety tip curated through JENI, the virtual safety concierge.

The world is an uncertain place, especially for travelers and commuters. WanderSafe alerts you of health, geopolitical and terrorism threats, while also suggesting spots AND where to enjoy or what to avoid in real time.

WanderSafe’s design and features are created by both travel mavens and safety experts. On board at WanderSafe is a Retired CIA safety expert and a team with more than 100 years and 100 countries collectively visited.

Help others! Verified users and all around good folks can contribute and share what is safe in their location, through locally-based tips to help others in their neighborhoods or while traveling when they are away from home.

The WanderSafe app is only available for iOS but an Android version is currently in development.

You can download it here

Check out our FAQ section by clicking here. Still have questions?  Send a message to communitymgr@jozuforwomen.com or post a comment on the page here, if you're a backer, and we'll be happy to help!

Thank you for your support!

story:
The most comfortable mountain bike in the world

Mountain biking is a fascinating & exciting sport. A lot of bikers will stay away from rugged and steep mountain roads.

Advene hopes that everyone can easily enjoy the joy of mountain biking. As a result, Advene combines traditional mountain bike with electric drive systems & build the most energy-saving mountain bike in the world.

  • Effortless Cycling

Advene powerful pedal-assisted system makes it easy to conquer steep hills. The mountain’s top scenery and the thrill of downhill are all yours now.

  • Rides like a Pro

Pedal-assisted mode makes it easy for you to get the speed of a professional rider. Surpass anyone easily & cycle far ahead. 

  • Fatigue-free Riding

The booster pedal-assisted amplifies your strength, allowing you to ride for a longer time. Stay energetic, enjoy the scenery & speed on the road. Best partner for commuting & outing.

  • Perfect Combination

Hidden battery, quiet & powerful motor system. Advene matches e-motors with traditional mountain bikes. Making you look cooler than anyone.

Seamless Battery Pack Design

Cycle up to 80 km with LG's new 18650 lithium-ion battery. Perfectly hidden in the frame, detachable, safe & reliable with a battery lock.

Resistance-free

Light weigh, high-performance brushless motor. Making you glide along the road when you cycle.

 

  • Smart Control

Easily switch the riding mode to meet your styles on the intelligent driving system.

Cycling mode      

It behaves like a traditional mountain bike without electric mode.

Pedal-assisted mode      

The pedal-assisted system will amplify your power and let you cycle easily. The adjustable power level for different needs.

 

  • Night Cycling Safety Features

Reliable at night with front bright riding lights.

 

Stylish & reliable mountain bike

Advene is not only stylish but also a professional-built mountain bicycle. Complete reliability in dynamic engineering, ergonomics, structural materials & safety standards.

 

  • High-strength, Lightweight Alu Frame

6061 aluminum alloy body. Stylish and cool that comes with durable & reliable quality bike parts.

 

  • Smooth Speed-changing Experience

It comes with Shimano 27-speed transmission. Known for its fast and reliable gear adjustment.

 

  • No fear of Rough Roads with Rock Shox fork

Adjustable suspension fork provides you with choices of racing/ off-road modes. Suitable for various road conditions.

 

  • Sensitive & Efficient Braking System

Reliable full-disc brake system with sharp braking for outstanding performance. Awesome maneuver control with a sensitive braking mechanism.

 

  • Safe Cycling with KENDA Tires

Professional cycling tires with high abrasion resistance & superior grip. The unique tread design has the dual effect of reducing rolling slip & anti-slip. Do not need to worry rain/ shine, flat or mountainous as its equipped with anti-puncture tape.

 

 

Specifications Square Up

 

  Sleek bike frame
  • Light aluminum alloy grade 6061 frame
  • Able to withstand up to 400 pounds
  • Bike weight: 19.5 Kg / 44 lbs
  • 2 color options: Passionate Red, Cool Black
  Battery’s proprietary tech
  • Standard version 36v 7.6ah
  • *Upgraded version 36v 10.4ah
  • Up to 80 km (50 miles) travel distance
  • Standard charge time 4 to 6 hours
  • *Upgraded speed charger 2 to 4 hours
  • Integrated battery - detachable for easy charging
  • LG's new 18650 lith-ion battery cells
  • The battery can be easily secured and removed from the frame with a discreet key lock
  Powerful and silent motor
  • 250 watts booster motor, EU model
  • 350 watts booster motor, US model
  • Speed up to 32km/hr (20 mph)
  Throttle for full electric or pedal assist rides
  • Comes with thumb throttle to go full electric or maintain pedal assisted
  Rust-free gearing components
  • Shimano 27 speed gears
  • Quick response riding with reliable mechanical disc brakes
  • *Upgraded version Tektro hydraulic disc brakes
  • Adjustable preload and mechanical lock-out Rock Shox front suspension fork for all terrains
  • Fitted with strong safety front light
  • Adjustable seat for maximum comfort while riding
  • Uncluttered steering handlebar for the perfect fit
  • Safe grip rubber handlebars with added support
  Puncture-proof wheelset
  • 27.5”x2.128 wheel size for greater control & speed
  • Fitted with puncture-proof strips
  • All-terrain tires
  Smart
  • Smart variable speed options @ 6 speeds
  • Full throttle or Pedal Assisted Option
  • Automatic drive function
  • Easy, on-the-go speed adjustment
  • Configurable for personal settings
  • Backlit LCD screen
  • Displays battery time, speed and distance
  • Water and dust-proof
  • *Upgraded version built-in USB charger

 

9 accessories & upgrade options:

 

   
   
   

 

*Click the respective perk to get the 9 different accessories & upgrade options.
**No shipping cost is required for any accessories and upgrade options when you order with your Advene e-MTB.

 

Pledge early and get up to 7 free gifts:

 

 

*For the 1st 50 backers, you will get a total of 7 free items worth up to US$250 (SG$340).
**For the next 49 backers, you will get a total of 5 free items (thumb throttle, air pump, lock, mobile-holder, toolset) worth up to S$151 (SG$210).
***Throughout this pre-sales, each backer will get at least 4 free items (air pump, lock, mobile-holder, toolset) worth up to US$103 (SG$144). 
****Lastly, a warranty value of US$1399 (SG$1944) for parts will be provided for all backers during this pre-sales.

 

The retail price is set at US$1399 (SG$1944) & introductory price at planned at US$899 (SG$1250). But for this presales, the Indiegogo special will start at US$499 (SG$699)!

 

Starting from  US$499 (SG$699), you are getting a great bike that is smart, sleek and safe! What are you waiting for?  It truly is an investment that you could use for a lifetime.

 

 

About Advene e-bikes:

 

 

Anzene is a company that designs and manufactures electric bicycles for Advene. It all started in August 2018, when CEO Joshua was looking for a commuting and weekend recreational electric mountain bike. There were high-end brands that were very good in the market at the time, but that had too many features that he needed a bicycle or cheaper brands that were not sure about the life of the batteries and motors. So Joshua developed this bicycle with a reasonable price for the necessary functions, and he believes it can be a versatile bicycle for many people, the first electric bicycle users, commuters, weekend leisure cyclists with family and friends.

We have secured production contracts with a reputable factory with over 10 years of production experience who is willing to support us with good costing for quality materials as they too believe in the future of electric bikes.
story_txt:
The most comfortable mountain bike in the worldMountain biking is a fascinating & exciting sport. A lot of bikers will stay away from rugged and steep mountain roads.Advene hopes that everyone can easily enjoy the joy of mountain biking. As a result, Advene combines traditional mountain bike with electric drive systems & build the most energy-saving mountain bike in the world.Effortless CyclingAdvene powerful pedal-assisted system makes it easy to conquer steep hills. The mountain’s top scenery and the thrill of downhill are all yours now.Rides like a ProPedal-assisted mode makes it easy for you to get the speed of a professional rider. Surpass anyone easily & cycle far ahead. Fatigue-free RidingThe booster pedal-assisted amplifies your strength, allowing you to ride for a longer time. Stay energetic, enjoy the scenery & speed on the road. Best partner for commuting & outing.Perfect CombinationHidden battery, quiet & powerful motor system. Advene matches e-motors with traditional mountain bikes. Making you look cooler than anyone.Seamless Battery Pack DesignCycle up to 80 km with LG's new 18650 lithium-ion battery. Perfectly hidden in the frame, detachable, safe & reliable with a battery lock.Resistance-freeLight weigh, high-performance brushless motor. Making you glide along the road when you cycle. Smart ControlEasily switch the riding mode to meet your styles on the intelligent driving system.Cycling mode      It behaves like a traditional mountain bike without electric mode.Pedal-assisted mode      The pedal-assisted system will amplify your power and let you cycle easily. The adjustable power level for different needs. Night Cycling Safety FeaturesReliable at night with front bright riding lights. Stylish & reliable mountain bikeAdvene is not only stylish but also a professional-built mountain bicycle. Complete reliability in dynamic engineering, ergonomics, structural materials & safety standards. High-strength, Lightweight Alu Frame6061 aluminum alloy body. Stylish and cool that comes with durable & reliable quality bike parts. Smooth Speed-changing ExperienceIt comes with Shimano 27-speed transmission. Known for its fast and reliable gear adjustment. No fear of Rough Roads with Rock Shox forkAdjustable suspension fork provides you with choices of racing/ off-road modes. Suitable for various road conditions. Sensitive & Efficient Braking SystemReliable full-disc brake system with sharp braking for outstanding performance. Awesome maneuver control with a sensitive braking mechanism. Safe Cycling with KENDA TiresProfessional cycling tires with high abrasion resistance & superior grip. The unique tread design has the dual effect of reducing rolling slip & anti-slip. Do not need to worry rain/ shine, flat or mountainous as its equipped with anti-puncture tape.  Specifications Square Up 

 

 

Sleek bike frame
Light aluminum alloy grade 6061 frame
Able to withstand up to 400 pounds
Bike weight: 19.5 Kg / 44 lbs
2 color options: Passionate Red, Cool Black




 

 

Battery’s proprietary tech
Standard version 36v 7.6ah
*Upgraded version 36v 10.4ah
Up to 80 km (50 miles) travel distance
Standard charge time 4 to 6 hours
*Upgraded speed charger 2 to 4 hours
Integrated battery - detachable for easy charging
LG's new 18650 lith-ion battery cells
The battery can be easily secured and removed from the frame with a discreet key lock




 

Powerful and silent motor
250 watts booster motor, EU model
350 watts booster motor, US model
Speed up to 32km/hr (20 mph)




 

Throttle for full electric or pedal assist ridesComes with thumb throttle to go full electric or maintain pedal assisted



 

 

Rust-free gearing components
Shimano 27 speed gears
Quick response riding with reliable mechanical disc brakes

*Upgraded version Tektro hydraulic disc brakes

Adjustable preload and mechanical lock-out Rock Shox front suspension fork for all terrains
Fitted with strong safety front light
Adjustable seat for maximum comfort while riding
Uncluttered steering handlebar for the perfect fit
Safe grip rubber handlebars with added support




 

Puncture-proof wheelset
27.5”x2.128 wheel size for greater control & speed
Fitted with puncture-proof strips
All-terrain tires




 

Smart
Smart variable speed options @ 6 speeds
Full throttle or Pedal Assisted Option
Automatic drive function
Easy, on-the-go speed adjustment
Configurable for personal settings
Backlit LCD screen
Displays battery time, speed and distance
Water and dust-proof
*Upgraded version built-in USB charger

 

9 accessories & upgrade options: 

 

 



 

 



 

 

 *Click the respective perk to get the 9 different accessories & upgrade options.**No shipping cost is required for any accessories and upgrade options when you order with your Advene e-MTB. Pledge early and get up to 7 free gifts:  *For the 1st 50 backers, you will get a total of 7 free items worth up to US$250 (SG$340).**For the next 49 backers, you will get a total of 5 free items (thumb throttle, air pump, lock, mobile-holder, toolset) worth up to S$151 (SG$210).***Throughout this pre-sales, each backer will get at least 4 free items (air pump, lock, mobile-holder, toolset) worth up to US$103 (SG$144). ****Lastly, a warranty value of US$1399 (SG$1944) for parts will be provided for all backers during this pre-sales. The retail price is set at US$1399 (SG$1944) & introductory price at planned at US$899 (SG$1250). But for this presales, the Indiegogo special will start at US$499 (SG$699)! Starting from  US$499 (SG$699), you are getting a great bike that is smart, sleek and safe! What are you waiting for?  It truly is an investment that you could use for a lifetime.  About Advene e-bikes:  Anzene is a company that designs and manufactures electric bicycles for Advene. It all started in August 2018, when CEO Joshua was looking for a commuting and weekend recreational electric mountain bike. There were high-end brands that were very good in the market at the time, but that had too many features that he needed a bicycle or cheaper brands that were not sure about the life of the batteries and motors. So Joshua developed this bicycle with a reasonable price for the necessary functions, and he believes it can be a versatile bicycle for many people, the first electric bicycle users, commuters, weekend leisure cyclists with family and friends.We have secured production contracts with a reputable factory with over 10 years of production experience who is willing to support us with good costing for quality materials as they too believe in the future of electric bikes.

story:
Dear friends, family, co-workers, people that love to fish, people that used to fish, people that know someone that loves to fish, people that take their children fishing, and people that may be contemplating the sport of fishing, this one's for you! Okay, that pretty much includes EVERYONE.  Hey, kayak fishermen (and women)--this is a game changer for you, you don't want to pass this one by!

HOW WAS MY IDEA BORN?
In the early 2000's, I was fishing with my brother, Charlie, near a rig out from Cocodrie, Louisiana in the Gulf of Mexico.  Charlie caught a small shark around 3 feet long and decided to bring it in the boat, against my better judgement.  The shark was angry, thrashing around, and determined to make its way back into the water.  We were trying our best to avoid the shark's sandpaper-like skin, a mouth full of sharp teeth, and his flailing tail.  Charlie is refusing to cut the line full of expensive tackle and I'm yelling, "Charlie! Why did you bring it on the boat?!"  Charlie decided on a plan--he would use an old towel on the boat to grab the shark, and using his best wrestling moves he would pin the shark against the side of the boat while I removed the hook from its mouth.  Wait, what?!!  Okay, here we go!  Charlie grabbed the shark, the shark got extremely agitated, I reached for the hook, the shark pulled away, I got hooked in the hand, and Charlie was bitten.  There you go, plan executed and failed.  Two grown men on a boat in the Gulf, in a fight with a 3 foot shark, both now bleeding and very unhappy.  (I will leave out the language due to this being a family-friendly campaign page)  Eventually, the hook was out and the shark was back in the water.


Me: (this is where you visualize a bleeding hand) "Charlie, don't they have something just to hold the fish so you can get the hook out of its mouth??"


Charlie: "Calvin! (cue visualizing the 2nd bleeding hand) Don't you think if there was something like that I would have TWO of them on the boat??!"


I spent the rest of the fishing trip pondering...  (It's what I do)


WHAT HAPPENED NEXT?
In the coming months, I searched patent sites and visited sporting goods stores and fishing departments and was unable to find anything close to the idea I had in my head.  I created a rough rendition of my thoughts out of coat hangers, cardboard, and a large spring I'd found.  I present to you prototype #1!  (in all its glory)




Some time later, I enlisted the help of my eldest son, Cal, Jr., to help create a better version in the GARage. (see what I did there)  Hence, prototype #2 pictured below made of metal.  Although bulky and heavy, it was functional and impressive.  Still, the fish could wiggle free.



 

Fast forward--Cal, Jr. and I constructed a lightweight, plastic prototype, fully functional but not very pretty.  (Okay, he constructed, I supervised)  Prototype #3 was similar to wrapping your hands around the fish and interlocking your fingers.  EUREKA!!  This is SO close to my idea!  My son had created what I had envisioned all these years.  Proud is quite an understatement, as you can imagine.  (<~~~~~ tugging on heartstrings emotion here)



NEED A SECOND OPINION?

"Here at Native Adventures, we complete 1000 successful charter trips a year.  We are a family run charter company out of Venice, Louisiana with 50 plus years experience in the game.  When The G.A.R. was brought to my attention, I was excited.  Yes, finally a tool that would save my hands.  Red fish and sheephead can be tough on an angler's hands, especially when you are catching and releasing 30 to 40 of them a day per boat.  The G.A.R. will make it safe for me and my clients on board the vessel and no more dropping fish that could end up in someone's foot or leg.  What a great idea!  Here at Native Adventures, we plan to get 2 per boat to keep our hands and clients safe on our charter trips."  --Captain Allen Moreau, Native Adventures, LLC 


HOOKED?
Bringing an idea from concept to the retail marketplace is quite costly and extremely time consuming.  Crowdfunding was always a consideration from the start, but felt that I owed it to my future customers to complete as much of the process as possible using personal funds before I began this phase.  Because much of the preparation has already been accomplished, we will now be able to move forward swiftly with the manufacturing process once the necessary funding has been secured.  The final stage to take The G.A.R. from concept to reality, and therefore be available for retail sales, is YOU!


THANK YOU!
For your time, for your contribution, for sharing my campaign with YOUR family and friends, and for your belief in me and my creation.

TOGETHER, let's make The G.A.R. a reality!

 

***JUST ABOUT EVERYTHING ELSE YOU WANT TO KNOW -- CHECK OUT FAQ***

 

(Grab and Release, LLC reserves the right to limit sponsorships which could result in the right of refusal)

story:
We present you MADÓ BAG| The Most Fashionable Travel Accessory made of leather, suede and extra strong tissue - cordura. 

 

 

MADÓ BAG is the most convenient and fashionable travel accessory. This is our first campaign running on crowdfunding platform and we hope to accomplish our mission succesfully!

 

 

Meet the 5 key features of MADO travel bag: 

 

1. You dont need to find solutions with iron or search for it, as you can simply hang your bag in your car while travelling and all your shirts and suits will be in perfect conditions as soon as you need them. 

 

 

In your car it will take a minimum of space intead of storing it as a classic luggage. 

 

 

2. WIth few extra pockets you can easily pack your essentials, includind socks, t-shirts, trousers and other things, which makes this bag as functional as bigger classic suitcases. 

 

 

3. You may think that you need to bring your shoes in a separate bag? But again, our team worked several month to assemble all key aspects of a business traveller in one bag, which permits to carry also a pair of shoes! 

 

 

 

4. Carry your hygienic stuff with you everywhere you go, MADO Bag allows you to make it with it's features of various pockets. 

 

 

 

5. The most efficient way to carry your bag from your car! You can simply turn it into a bag instead of a car hanger simply by carrying on your shoulder! 

 

 

 

 

Available in two variations AND more colors coming soon! 

 

 

Dimensions: 

 

Green and Brown Leather Bag   Length: 110cm  Width: 60cm  Thickness: 19cm

Blue and Brown Suede Bag        Length: 106cm  Width: 60cm  Thickness: 9.5cm

 

 What we believe is that there is no one thing that made our MADO Travel Bag such a huge success, but the combination of all our innovations bundled into a nice and elegant, finely tuned travel case. 

 

Video and Audio Content

All footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.

Warranty & Money Back Guarantee

MADO Travel Hanger Bag has a limited warranty of 2 years from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the zip or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks or signs of wear.

 

We will be glad if you can spread a word and help our start up, we are more than sure that we will bring a new direction in travel bags, as now it can be used also as a fashion accessory! 

 

Good Luck !

story:
ALONIWERK - The Home Away From Home

WELCOME to the first glamping resort in Kefalonia; a lavish place of rest, focussed on sustainable tourism. We invite you to stay on one of our flourishing camping pitches, in our luxury canvas tents, our glamping pods or tent cabins. All of these will be fully equipped and furnished.

ALONIWERK features a quiet, cozy retreat, located on 10.000 square meter green terraces, overlooking the gentle wooded hillside of the Paliki peninsula, on the west coast of Kefalonia.

 

ALONIWERK Campsite - the new glamping experience

Crawling over the hills near the capital of the island, Argostoli, you will find millennia old cyclopean walls, built out of huge carved blocks of stone - a tribute to the enormous effort of the ancient inhabitants of the island.

We have decided to take on a cyclopean sized task of our own.


 

The Aloniwerk campsite will be built just outside a small village called Rifi.

Sitting on the very top of the Paliki peninsula, our land offers a setting like no other. Narrow winding roads, rocky terrain with thick bush overgrowth present numerous challenges, which would normally put most big developers off.

 

 

Fortunately this leaves room for us - a family with a clear vision to build a place for you! This space is perfect for anyone who wishes to wake up to the sounds of goat herds grazing the rocky hills or avid bird watchers waiting for the powerful cries of nesting eagles.

If you are trying to avoid the busy all-inclusive hotel bars, but instead have a vision of sharing an evening with likeminded fellow travellers from all over the world, then look no further! We will host a range of local fresh products, from home-grown tomatoes to pitted olives and milk from the local shepherds.



 

Our Vision Is Unconventional

We aim to preserve the natural balances in our environment as much as possible, but we also have to meet all the legal requirements. This greatly increases our costs.


 

With that in mind we will get straight to the point; we want to open our doors to you in the spring 2020.
 

What We Are Looking For

We are seeking funding from people interested in sustainability and ecological tourism. 190.000,- € of funding is needed to complete the whole campsite project.

The Aloniwerk entire investment totals more than 500.000,- €

Amount of self investment already carried out: 225.000,- €

These funds will be used to:

pitch luxury accommodation pods, i.e. 4 geodesic domes* 40-50 m², 1 yurt* 40 m², 3 tent-cabins 16 - 20 m², (* all insulated, including heating-system, furnishing & bathroom)

further co-finance reforestation and greening of the campsite with endemic plants

kickstart the construction, regardless of whether this campaign reaches its full target

improve all parts of the accommodation and invest in future alternative energy (small wind turbines), should the campaign exceed its goal

 

Become An ALONIWERK Supporter - the idea

With a holiday at ALONIWERK you support the development of soft tourism on the island. Furthermore, you are also helping to promote our idea of quality stays which in turn sends a strong message against the negative impact of mass tourism. A number of holiday destinations are now showing more awareness of this positive change. This is a critical moment of self-awareness for countries economically dependent on travellers. With your decision to enjoy your holiday with us, you become part of this change.

We have managed to win over the local community and we have convinced the building authorities with the "green" design of our campsite: Now it’s your turn!

 

 

Join Us and become part of our vision of a distinctive campsite on an unspoiled green island in the heart of Europe. In return for your generous investment, we will be pleased to offer you the opportunity to be the first guests to visit ALONIWERK - your home away from home.

 

 

38° 14′ N, 20° 34′ O

Kefalonia, the largest of the Ionian Islands in Western Greece

 

 


 

 

What’s On Offer - holidays to happiness

You will camp with us in style, and we will show you the great outdoors, offering thrilling adventures that will be tonnes of fun! Upon your return, a cosy home awaits. We offer high-end comfort combined with the feeling of freedom and bespoke travel experiences.

 

 

We've got more cool perks in stock, for example several stunning photo art works from Tim, handmade designed art work from Nils, a range of culinary events, Alexandra's numerous anecdotes and hidden stories about the project, about the place and the island. "The Wall of Thanks" located within the campsite will be a tribute to our most generous donors together with "Patrons of Aloniwerk" olive trees planted in front of the main entrance. Make sure to look at all of our amazing perks.

Aside from the tangible perks, it is natural to us, as a family, to invite you to our fire with delicious red wine or a hot cup of cocoa under the starry sky.

 

 

Inspiring Perks - day trips, unity, joy and pleasure

We provide great day trips or tailored events to enhance your one or two week stay at ALONIWERK. Whether it be a tasty picnic with the vintner in their vine yard, or an exhilarating hike through scenic landscapes and beaches.

Our family is very skilled at creating imaginative holiday experiences. We arrange unique activities and excursions and produce creative photo & video material to make your vacation unforgettable.

We will take you to amazing places which we discovered ourselves when we started our personal "greek holiday adventure" in 1990.

 

More Than Just Rewards - a glimpse into our lives

Each one of us plays a vital role in creating ALONIWERK.

Tim has specialised in nature and landscape photography, and has an eye for breathtaking scenery. He has great passion for history and an uncanny sense for finding signs of bygone times, the common traveler is less likely to notice, such as ancient paths, traces of the mycenaean period, small Byzantine churches, hidden wells and caverns and ruins of former settlements.

Melina is the driving force in the background. With her friendly, calm and thoughtful nature, she ensures that nothing gets out of hand and that joy and creativity come first. Her skillset will ensure the smooth running of not only the project, but your experiences on your holiday.

Nils is gifted with enthusiasm, cheerfullness and immense creativity. Whether he is working as a drone operator, graphic designer or offering unique media workshops, he will guarantee fun and development.

Alexandra - that's me; I have experience in developing concept design in the media and tourism sectors which I have gained during the nearly 30 years of holidaying, working and living on the island. I am passionate about local history, culture, nature and food.

We all live and breathe the activities and services we offer.

 

 

 

Accommodation - The Local Inspiration

You can find traditional shepherd stone shelters scattered all across the island. Blending in with the surrounding nature they are subtle and gentle on the eye.

 

We have been intrigued by these since the first time we came to the island. That’s why we came up with the following:

 

A Luxury Glamping Yurt
Surrounded by a protective stone wind breaker greened with various Mediterranean plants our already existing yurt made from natural materials offers good natural air flow and a glass roof ideal for star gazing.


 

A Luxury Igloo-Inspired Glamping Dome
A more modern accommodation offering a wider viewing angle. This dome is also eco friendly thanks to utilising solar fans and passive air circulation for cooling. Ideal for being closer to nature. Spacious enough for up to 5 people.


Stone Cottages - designed for the future to connect past and present
Inspired by the traditional shepherd stone shelters we designed our own stone huts that mimic those in a modern way.

Greece´s bureaucracy, especially the different opinions relating to the urban image within the archaeological department, have made it very difficult to get this design approved.

 

We therefore decided to continue with an easier design, and we will leave this draft in the drawer, at least for now.

 

Well-Being
ALONIWERK is made for guests who like tending to their individual well-being. It is ideal for those who want the opportunity to engage in activities in nature, to gain insights into traditional cooking cultures, and more. If you are lucky you will also be able to meet local beekeepers or vintners, or visit the local farms to try the delicacies on offer.

.

Our vision is that ALONIWERK will be joy for all the senses.

To materialise our dream we need your help, your generosity, and backing to raise the funds.            

"Don't dream your life, but live your dream" (Mark Twain 30.11.1835 - 21.04.1910)

 

Summary - ALONIWERK is "handmade"

More and more people are looking for an adequate alternative to our fast-moving, consumerist lifestyle. Everything we offer is personally developed by us. After decades of exploring the island by foot, kayak and jeep, we have come to know every square meter of it. We have become close friends with many amazing people born here, who are eager to share their love for their home. A deep insight into the culture, traditions, history and peculiarities of this part of Greece has been offered to us.

 

 

We will use this knowledge to carefully balance your stay with us and create something unforgettable.

 

 

Our Impact - soft tourism as a chance

Sustainable tourism is a respectful way of travelling and exploring a destination. In 2019 many people travel, more now than ever before! The average traveller participates in mass tourism, which can be detrimental to the local culture and natural resources. This is why we have opted for buildings that are in keeping with the region, and have only 17 different options for accommodation. It is a known fact that most of the money generated from mass tourism goes to large companies instead of remaining in the country you visit.

Here at ALONIWERK we invite you to stay with us, and join us and invest in our family-run business.

Our mission is to offer a full spectrum experience, to which getting to know the island is an essential part of. The guided tours you will find among our services are specifically designed to encompass famous Greek hospitality with the island’s unique cuisine, to trace thousands of years of turbulent history, and to take you places where breath-taking views have not yet been seen by many.

 

 

Risks & Challenges - what we have done so far

The whole property, covering an area of some 10,000 sq m., belongs to us already; all permits for the operation of the campsite are available, including building approval.

We have successfully completed the planning phase and moved into the implementation and construction stages.

The building period comprises of at least 6 - 8 months. Building delays can always happen. Therefore, the campsite is due to open in spring 2020. That leaves enough time for construction.

Your accommodation perk certificate will be valid once the campsite has started operation and remains valid for the next three years after the opening date (planned for Q2/2020).

Measures already implemented to communicate the campaign and the project are: Imagefilm, website, information on social network platforms, several advertising materials.

Measures already taken and ongoing: Youth exchange programmes between Greece and Germany are already established as a stable customer base. We have already completed extensive preparative landscaping on our land ready for 2020. Additionally, tailored group tours and activitites have been tested since 2011.

We've prepared for the worst case scenario and even if we don't reach our own goal, we are still able to fulfil our pledge of perks to you, thanks to our years of experience and resources already available to us.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you cannot contribute financially, but that does not mean that you cannot help: Please talk about this campaign and make ALONIWERK well known and support us with word-of-mouth  and social media advertising.

 

The ALONIWERK Team

 

Starting up a business on Kefalonia is the logical consequence of working in our own media sector company for more than 20 years in Germany plus 10 years of experience in tourism sector and implementation of different youth projects.

We work in a team of family members and friends, helping and supporting each other. Advantage of such a network is our ability to make the best out of our diverse strengths and potentials. Together we are developing ALONIWERK Campsite - a project based on the model of active experience and perception.

Deep interest in tourism, environment and culture together with close bonds between team members are the driving forces, which make all of us so dedicated to the project.
story_txt:
ALONIWERK - The Home Away From Home
WELCOME to the first glamping resort in Kefalonia; a lavish place of rest, focussed on sustainable tourism. We invite you to stay on one of our flourishing camping pitches, in our luxury canvas tents, our glamping pods or tent cabins. All of these will be fully equipped and furnished.
ALONIWERK features a quiet, cozy retreat, located on 10.000 square meter green terraces, overlooking the gentle wooded hillside of the Paliki peninsula, on the west coast of Kefalonia.
 
ALONIWERK Campsite - the new glamping experience
Crawling over the hills near the capital of the island, Argostoli, you will find millennia old cyclopean walls, built out of huge carved blocks of stone - a tribute to the enormous effort of the ancient inhabitants of the island.
We have decided to take on a cyclopean sized task of our own.

 
The Aloniwerk campsite will be built just outside a small village called Rifi.
Sitting on the very top of the Paliki peninsula, our land offers a setting like no other. Narrow winding roads, rocky terrain with thick bush overgrowth present numerous challenges, which would normally put most big developers off.
 

 
Fortunately this leaves room for us - a family with a clear vision to build a place for you! This space is perfect for anyone who wishes to wake up to the sounds of goat herds grazing the rocky hills or avid bird watchers waiting for the powerful cries of nesting eagles.
If you are trying to avoid the busy all-inclusive hotel bars, but instead have a vision of sharing an evening with likeminded fellow travellers from all over the world, then look no further! We will host a range of local fresh products, from home-grown tomatoes to pitted olives and milk from the local shepherds.


 
Our Vision Is Unconventional
We aim to preserve the natural balances in our environment as much as possible, but we also have to meet all the legal requirements. This greatly increases our costs.
 
With that in mind we will get straight to the point; we want to open our doors to you in the spring 2020. 
What We Are Looking For
We are seeking funding from people interested in sustainability and ecological tourism. 190.000,- € of funding is needed to complete the whole campsite project.
The Aloniwerk entire investment totals more than 500.000,- €
Amount of self investment already carried out: 225.000,- €
These funds will be used to:
pitch luxury accommodation pods, i.e. 4 geodesic domes* 40-50 m², 1 yurt* 40 m², 3 tent-cabins 16 - 20 m², (* all insulated, including heating-system, furnishing & bathroom)
further co-finance reforestation and greening of the campsite with endemic plants
kickstart the construction, regardless of whether this campaign reaches its full target
improve all parts of the accommodation and invest in future alternative energy (small wind turbines), should the campaign exceed its goal
 
Become An ALONIWERK Supporter - the idea
With a holiday at ALONIWERK you support the development of soft tourism on the island. Furthermore, you are also helping to promote our idea of quality stays which in turn sends a strong message against the negative impact of mass tourism. A number of holiday destinations are now showing more awareness of this positive change. This is a critical moment of self-awareness for countries economically dependent on travellers. With your decision to enjoy your holiday with us, you become part of this change.
We have managed to win over the local community and we have convinced the building authorities with the "green" design of our campsite: Now it’s your turn!
 
 
Join Us and become part of our vision of a distinctive campsite on an unspoiled green island in the heart of Europe. In return for your generous investment, we will be pleased to offer you the opportunity to be the first guests to visit ALONIWERK - your home away from home.
 

 
38° 14′ N, 20° 34′ O
Kefalonia, the largest of the Ionian Islands in Western Greece
 
 
 
 
What’s On Offer - holidays to happiness
You will camp with us in style, and we will show you the great outdoors, offering thrilling adventures that will be tonnes of fun! Upon your return, a cosy home awaits. We offer high-end comfort combined with the feeling of freedom and bespoke travel experiences.
 

 
We've got more cool perks in stock, for example several stunning photo art works from Tim, handmade designed art work from Nils, a range of culinary events, Alexandra's numerous anecdotes and hidden stories about the project, about the place and the island. "The Wall of Thanks" located within the campsite will be a tribute to our most generous donors together with "Patrons of Aloniwerk" olive trees planted in front of the main entrance. Make sure to look at all of our amazing perks.
Aside from the tangible perks, it is natural to us, as a family, to invite you to our fire with delicious red wine or a hot cup of cocoa under the starry sky.
 

 
Inspiring Perks - day trips, unity, joy and pleasure
We provide great day trips or tailored events to enhance your one or two week stay at ALONIWERK. Whether it be a tasty picnic with the vintner in their vine yard, or an exhilarating hike through scenic landscapes and beaches.
Our family is very skilled at creating imaginative holiday experiences. We arrange unique activities and excursions and produce creative photo & video material to make your vacation unforgettable.
We will take you to amazing places which we discovered ourselves when we started our personal "greek holiday adventure" in 1990.

 
More Than Just Rewards - a glimpse into our lives
Each one of us plays a vital role in creating ALONIWERK.
Tim has specialised in nature and landscape photography, and has an eye for breathtaking scenery. He has great passion for history and an uncanny sense for finding signs of bygone times, the common traveler is less likely to notice, such as ancient paths, traces of the mycenaean period, small Byzantine churches, hidden wells and caverns and ruins of former settlements.
Melina is the driving force in the background. With her friendly, calm and thoughtful nature, she ensures that nothing gets out of hand and that joy and creativity come first. Her skillset will ensure the smooth running of not only the project, but your experiences on your holiday.
Nils is gifted with enthusiasm, cheerfullness and immense creativity. Whether he is working as a drone operator, graphic designer or offering unique media workshops, he will guarantee fun and development.
Alexandra - that's me; I have experience in developing concept design in the media and tourism sectors which I have gained during the nearly 30 years of holidaying, working and living on the island. I am passionate about local history, culture, nature and food.
We all live and breathe the activities and services we offer.
 

 
 
Accommodation - The Local Inspiration
You can find traditional shepherd stone shelters scattered all across the island. Blending in with the surrounding nature they are subtle and gentle on the eye.
 

We have been intrigued by these since the first time we came to the island. That’s why we came up with the following:
 
A Luxury Glamping YurtSurrounded by a protective stone wind breaker greened with various Mediterranean plants our already existing yurt made from natural materials offers good natural air flow and a glass roof ideal for star gazing.
 
A Luxury Igloo-Inspired Glamping DomeA more modern accommodation offering a wider viewing angle. This dome is also eco friendly thanks to utilising solar fans and passive air circulation for cooling. Ideal for being closer to nature. Spacious enough for up to 5 people.
Stone Cottages - designed for the future to connect past and presentInspired by the traditional shepherd stone shelters we designed our own stone huts that mimic those in a modern way.
Greece´s bureaucracy, especially the different opinions relating to the urban image within the archaeological department, have made it very difficult to get this design approved.
 
We therefore decided to continue with an easier design, and we will leave this draft in the drawer, at least for now.
 
Well-BeingALONIWERK is made for guests who like tending to their individual well-being. It is ideal for those who want the opportunity to engage in activities in nature, to gain insights into traditional cooking cultures, and more. If you are lucky you will also be able to meet local beekeepers or vintners, or visit the local farms to try the delicacies on offer..
Our vision is that ALONIWERK will be joy for all the senses.
To materialise our dream we need your help, your generosity, and backing to raise the funds.            
 "Don't dream your life, but live your dream" (Mark Twain 30.11.1835 - 21.04.1910)
 
Summary - ALONIWERK is "handmade"

More and more people are looking for an adequate alternative to our fast-moving, consumerist lifestyle. Everything we offer is personally developed by us. After decades of exploring the island by foot, kayak and jeep, we have come to know every square meter of it. We have become close friends with many amazing people born here, who are eager to share their love for their home. A deep insight into the culture, traditions, history and peculiarities of this part of Greece has been offered to us.
 


 
We will use this knowledge to carefully balance your stay with us and create something unforgettable.
 


 
Our Impact - soft tourism as a chance
Sustainable tourism is a respectful way of travelling and exploring a destination. In 2019 many people travel, more now than ever before! The average traveller participates in mass tourism, which can be detrimental to the local culture and natural resources. This is why we have opted for buildings that are in keeping with the region, and have only 17 different options for accommodation. It is a known fact that most of the money generated from mass tourism goes to large companies instead of remaining in the country you visit.
Here at ALONIWERK we invite you to stay with us, and join us and invest in our family-run business.
Our mission is to offer a full spectrum experience, to which getting to know the island is an essential part of. The guided tours you will find among our services are specifically designed to encompass famous Greek hospitality with the island’s unique cuisine, to trace thousands of years of turbulent history, and to take you places where breath-taking views have not yet been seen by many.
 


 
Risks & Challenges - what we have done so far
The whole property, covering an area of some 10,000 sq m., belongs to us already; all permits for the operation of the campsite are available, including building approval.
We have successfully completed the planning phase and moved into the implementation and construction stages.
The building period comprises of at least 6 - 8 months. Building delays can always happen. Therefore, the campsite is due to open in spring 2020. That leaves enough time for construction.
Your accommodation perk certificate will be valid once the campsite has started operation and remains valid for the next three years after the opening date (planned for Q2/2020).
Measures already implemented to communicate the campaign and the project are: Imagefilm, website, information on social network platforms, several advertising materials.
Measures already taken and ongoing: Youth exchange programmes between Greece and Germany are already established as a stable customer base. We have already completed extensive preparative landscaping on our land ready for 2020. Additionally, tailored group tours and activitites have been tested since 2011.
We've prepared for the worst case scenario and even if we don't reach our own goal, we are still able to fulfil our pledge of perks to you, thanks to our years of experience and resources already available to us.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Some of you cannot contribute financially, but that does not mean that you cannot help: Please talk about this campaign and make ALONIWERK well known and support us with word-of-mouth  and social media advertising.
 
The ALONIWERK Team Starting up a business on Kefalonia is the logical consequence of working in our own media sector company for more than 20 years in Germany plus 10 years of experience in tourism sector and implementation of different youth projects.We work in a team of family members and friends, helping and supporting each other. Advantage of such a network is our ability to make the best out of our diverse strengths and potentials. Together we are developing ALONIWERK Campsite - a project based on the model of active experience and perception.Deep interest in tourism, environment and culture together with close bonds between team members are the driving forces, which make all of us so dedicated to the project.

story:
SAND-DISCHARGE MESH: There is a concealed mesh at the bottom which is easily accessible to get rid of sand from the inside of the bag.
 

ECO BAG: All our bags come with an additional reusable washable bag-ECO BAG- that can be used to keep your wet / dirty clothes separate. 

 
SAND-RESISTANT FABRIC:
 
 
COOLER POCKET WITH BOTTLE OPENER- The cooler pocket is designed with an insulation fabric that maintains the temperature of the item in the pocket. Be it chilled beer to enjoy with your friends or cold water to stay hydrated, it lets you carry whatever you want. And what's more cool is that it has a bottle opener attached as well.

 
BEACH TOWEL HOLDER: Use the external towel holder to carry an extra towel or use it to save some space inside your bag.

 
BUILT-IN CASE FOR SUNGLASSES: Forgetting your sunglasses case is not a problem anymore. This padded pocket protects your sunglasses all the time and you have one less thing to remember while packing.

 
ELECTRONICS POCKET: Holds all your electronic valuables easily.

 
FLIP-FLOP POCKET: A separate pocket for your flipflops so that you don't have to dump them with your clothes or electronic devices.

 
KEY HOLDER: So that your keys are always at reach.

 
EASY ACCESS POCKET: Get easy and quick access to your small beach items.

 

 
BUILT-IN USB PORTS :  There are two built-in USB ports which are designed such that you can conveniently charge your android and apple devices at once. The pockets are designed in a manner which lets you conveniently connect it with your power bank and charge two devices at once.
 
 
WATER-REPELLENT FABRIC: The shell is made of canvas fabric with a water-repellent coating. 

NEW STYLES 2019

RAINFOREST: Capturing the magical effect of nature on the leaves makes this tote special. The print is hand printed which makes every tote unique and distinct.

 

Sahara: Sahara comes from our love with sand, the little granular material without which you cannot imagine your day at the beach. Accentuated with multicolored pompoms to make your day bright and colorful.

 

Classic:A minimal design tote which never goes out of style. Colorful canvas lends a cheerful feel and is a perfect bag for your outdoor travel.

Belize: Anchor your spot in the sun with our beautiful tote. Spacious enough to hold your essentials and stylish enough to get you attention.

Duffle:A true versatile bag, this duffle brings a fresh style to carry your items anywhere you want. A multi-purpose bag not just for travel but also for daily use to the office and gym.

 

 

What if you never had to worry about how to protect your belongings from sand and water at the beach? What if you just had one bag to pack all your beach essentials in a more organized way? We designed DEZZIO to solve all these problems and make your day at the beach exactly what you had hoped for- FUN AND RELAXING. 

DEZZIO is designed with a modern and innovative touch to change the way beach-goers pack essential items and keep them sand-free. With its 10 special features and unique design, this bag is the perfect beach bag that you will want to carry this summer. Through every step of our journey, we’ve held your needs at the core of everything we’ve done; obsessing over every element and functional detail to ensure we’ve created the very best beach bag. It is available in 3 styles and different sizes for men, women and families.

 

 

 

 

We understand the importance of the fabric which is why we have spent days working with world class manufacturers to produce a fabric which protects your belongings from sand and water. The shell is made of 100% Cotton Canvas with a special coating and the lining is made of 100% Waterproof Polyester. There is padding between the shell and lining which makes the bag sturdier and durable.

The SIGNATURE bag in particular comes with leather straps and a leather piping to give it an elevated finish.

 

 

Size is very important when it comes to beach bags. You want to be sure you have the right size that can accommodate everything you want to carry at the beach.

DUFFLE: It has an adjustable side that can expand and contract depending on the load. Duffle has the same capacity as the Large Signature/Large Classic.

SIGNATURE/CLASSIC: Pre-orders open for the Large size only. 

  • LARGE: 2-3 flip flops, 2*1L bottle, 2-3 towels, 1 pair of sunglasses, clothes for 2-3 people, beach toys, tablet, phone, wallet, keys, magazine, lotion, portable battery and other miscellaneous items.

 

 


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Below are the risks and challenges that we anticipate during the process:

We realize that Manufacturing is something that turns out to be the most challenging part for most campaigns. This has thus been our main area of focus in the entire campaign until now. We have worked extremely hard with various suppliers and locked down the ones we found best beforehand to ensure minimum risks. We can proudly say that “the PROTOTYPES are made with the same FACTORY that we will use for the MAIN RUN”.

There may be slight variations in the final product based on our transition from the prototypes used in the photos and video. However, we assure you that it will be better than the prototypes and we will keep you updated throughout the process.

It's difficult to predict unforeseen circumstances but we have invested significant groundwork and will do our best to solve problems efficiently. Whatever happens, we assure you that we will get through it and deliver what we promise.

story:
How's your sleep when you travel? Probably not so great. Or maybe you just think to yourself, what the heck, it's just a trip. But think about it, the whole purpose of a trip is to relax and appreciate your destination, so why not enjoy the ride as well?

Our sleep tool is a new breed of travel pillows. An unusual pillow, for an unusually good sleep that has been designed to fit your favorite sleeping position. Our goal was to make you sleep comfortably and help you maintain a good posture because your health matters. We invest so much money in having a perfect bed, and great pillows, so why not invest in the best travel pillow then?

Highlights

  1. Linear shape ensures that your head remains in its axis. Why should you care? Because it optimizes your body for a deeper sleep and completely removes neck soreness and back pain. 
  2. Next-generation flexible support the keystone of strong support is the material.  MonPère is made of solid silicone to keep it flexible but firm. We also added a second layer of rods in the finger to allow your head to rest entirely. No matter the weight, you're always comfortable. 
  3. 15-30 min a flight expert says that a lack of sleep during travel increases heart risks, loss of concentration, irritability, and appetite.

Tips to sleep on a plane

While a few lucky folks can pass out easily upon takeoff, for most of us, quality in-flight sleep is a struggle. And that can lead to exhaustion and several nights of playing catch-up when you arrive at your final destination.

Beyond the tips you likely already know—invest in earplugs, an eyemask, wear comfy clothing; and upgrade to a first-class ticket (#lifegoals)—here are 6 tips for more ways you can rest en route.

1. Uncross your legs

2. Wear socks

3. Lean back

4. Avoid alcohol

5. Don't eat too much

6. Power down all electronics

Simply bend one end of the product around yourself or the back your seat and bend the other end into a secure position for your head. You can even use the hand to hold your device for movie time.

Roll it up in less than 10 sec

 

Where to use it? 

 

MyDaddysArms founder and inventor Sylvain Bérubé is a Montréal-based sports therapist and trainer. After years of traveling around the world and living in unseen countries he decided that it was time we get rid off the traditional problem of bad sleep on the planes. The MonPère project all started when he saw his daughter Raphaëlle's bent sleep posture on a road trip in Hawaii. At that time he did what dads do best. He fixed it. 4 years of development and testing has passed to finally bring you MonPère sleep tool. A travel pillow that offers support, security and a quirky personality. Just like dad.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Secure your head

Lean your head back, forward or to the side. MyDaddysArms keeps your head resting comfortably in the position you choose. No more bouncing around.

 

Ergonomic design

MyDaddysArms uses your natural pressure points to create resistance. Wake up feeling rested, not like you just got run over by a truck. Sized for children and adults.

 

Weird for a reason

Our quirky form is the sum of countless tests and prototypes. The result is an unexpected design with human form hands to keep your head resting securely. 

 

 

 

 

 

Sylvain & Raphaëlle Bérubé

 

Founder & inventor:

Sylvain Bérubé is a sought after trainer and sports therapist based in Montréal, Canada. His work in physical health led him to rethink the way we rest our heads when we travel.

Lead Product Tester:

Raphaëlle Bérubé draws on six years of life experience and sleepy times to test and improve each sleep tool prototype.

Contributors:

Industrial Design- Takdesign
Crowdfunding Development- Startl.us
Brand ID - Detraform
