I wanted a forecasting app that had everything, Swell size, Wind, Tide, Everything in one sweet user friendly area - to quickly look and go to do my sports.
 I wanted a design that was easy to read and felt like it was made for me and my active life.
I wanted a forecast that fit my style, with unique functions and reliability.
 I needed a forecasting app made for my life.
Now that it’s finally here, this is one app you or I will ever need

 
WHY INDIEGOGO?
PRE-ORDERS. The main purpose of this campaign is for promotional and pre-order activities. We are offering the project backers a unique opportunity to get our marine forecasting app at an incredibly attractive price ‘FREE! for LIFE” (including all future updates) immediately during and at the end of the product campaign, before the app is put up for subscription. All pre-orders will also get a lifetime of new features and functions.
 
Building a Better Forecasting App
Together with my partner Boris, we developed a predictive algorithm (smart computer program) we call TWIGGE, or the “The Weather Information Global Gathering Environment.” This intelligent computer program forecasts and predicts surf at your local break. TWIGGE is very accurate, forecasting swells thousands of miles away then predicting those same swells at the local surf spot.

Boris and I spent months just designing and working on the user interface or how the screen works with the user. We researched our customers - found out what they liked and designed our surf forecasting app around that focus.
We have Exceptional Current Resources - we use over 7 global weather data resources and work personally with them to suggest what we need, and they in turn research their data driven computer models to improve spatial resolution (or precision of a measurement on the current weather model or weather map) for us.

Our Innovation Never Stops - We are in contact with “Big Wave Riders” who are testing our long range models helping us improve our developed forecasts. 

 

Our Funding Needs and What You Will Receive
Your contributions will go towards funding the marketing of our fully functional app called the "Old Man’s Surf Report" (Old Man’s) for IOS mobile devices.

The Old Man IOS app is already fully functional including several features and functionalities like favorite marine breaks and secret spots.
We are asking for $6,500. With your help we will use the money to alert people who are unhappy with the existing big swell forecasting companies, and that they have a better choice.
Our funding goal of $6,500 is our budget to accomplish the marketing of our app, targeting surfer oriented print and social media products.
The Android version, we would love to include as our stretch-goals, with extra funding, development for the Android mobile operating system will be accomplished.
Old Man’s unique intelligent programming is focused on how the swell breaks at the local level, it’s bathymetry (or measurement of the depth of the water), how the tide, swell height, swell period, wind, and the local coastline locations affect your local break. 
For the past few months the Old Man’s app was tested by hundreds of people. It has received rave reviews by testimonies and all 5 star reviews from the Apple Store


 

 
Have Fun and Enjoy Life
One of Old Man’s goal is to create an open minded and inclusive community for people who love marine sports regardless of how far they live from the beach or water seashores.
Making Accurate Marine Sports Forecasting Available Is Important To Us!

 
Old Man’s App is for

The Fun Addicted
The Brave Beginners
The Fearless
The Adrenaline Junkies

 
Our Smart, Intuitive, User Defined Interface
The only marine forecasting app you'll ever need. Our smart, intuitive, user defined marine weather app is loaded with features like favorite breaks and secret spots, and ready to take on the world.

Some of Old Man's Features and Functions

Actual Surf Breaks, 
All Marine Buoy Data Needed
Easy To Read And Understand
Over 7 World-Wide Resources Like NOAA, Storm Glass, Buoys From Europe, Africa and Asia And More
7-Day Forecast And a 7-Day Forecast Summary 
Adding Your own Favorites and Secret Spots, and
TWIGGE, Our Expert Algorithm Which Forecasts This At Any local Surf Break Around The World

 

 
 
Our Design and Feedback

In designing the Old Man’s Marine app, we considered the full range of feedback from marine app users requirements: what needed to be accessed quickly, what needed to be simply and accurately reviewed, and what needed to be quickly summarized.
We attempted to strike a balance between the model of the phone size and operating system as well as the actual information on the smallest screen size without making information too difficult to see.
We used focus groups for their feedback. Most users needed certain requirements and services so we built that into our apps environment. We wanted to capture the needs of most user’s therefore helping them to engage more within the app.
We're thrilled with the result; Old Man’s app provided users a fast and accurate way to look up of marine forecasting information on our smallest supported iPhone, the apple iPhone 5. And an accurate friendly mobile screen, free from ads, encouraging forecast engagement.
Just like wetsuit pioneer Jack O’Neill, Old Man’s app founders William P. Messier & Boris Gundertlach wanted to create something that would allow people to do their water sports more wisely and focused on technology for inspiration. We wanted to push the limits of forecasting marine sports resulting in finding better days to Surf, SUP, Waveski and Foil because that is our ultimate love!
Old Man’s app was created for people who love and respect demanding outdoor marine sports. Using the app gets them to their location sooner, 7-day forecast and 7-day summary lets them plan out their week more efficiently, and TWIGGE, our expert algorithm allows them to do this with accurate information.


 
What Our Customers Think of Old Man's
 

 
 
Using Old Man's For a Typical Surf Session
This Feature Shows How to Get a “7 DAY SUMMARY FORECAST ”


This Winter, because of this feature mentioned above, I was able to plan in advance to be able to ride more waves than ever before!
 
 

Our Stretch Goals
Main Goal
$6,500 for marketing targeted resources

If We Reach $10,000 - We will develop a complete working Apple Watch version.
If We Reach $15,000 - We will be able to develop a complete working version for the Android mobile operating system including a Metic System to measure in meters.
If We Reach $20,000 - We will add more advanced components to TWIGGY’s intelligence for marine forecasting.

If We Reach $25,000+ - We will develop a complete working Old Man’s OSX (Mac) Desktop version.

 
Our Team - People Behind the Old Man’s Surf Report


It is just the two of us

Co-partner and CTO Boris Gundelach with over 20 years application development in the USA and Europe is the lead in all things Old Man's.
Co-partner and CEO, Dr. William P. Messier has over 15 years experience in user interface development and over 40ty years experience surfing and forecasting swells all over the world.

 

 
More About Us
I'm William P. Messier, the co-founder of Old Man’s.
For as long as I can remember I've had a taste for marine adventure and big challenges. I worked in the computer industry most of my life when programming was done on on computer punch cards and computers filled up rooms in order to operate.

Surfing the early years, I developed a passion for forecasting marine sports and the only way to get a good forecast was to call life guards, read the newspaper, listen to the radio or step on the sand.
My dream was to create a mobile device that will help you understand marine weather and see forecasting trends 7 days out with just a motion of your hand. The technology was not available.
As the technology improved to what I felt was needed to initiate user defined designs, I vowed to finally pursue my dream and began working on the marine forecasting app of all apps.
My recent LinkedIn profile is available here ( check out some of the marine sport videos): 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/wpmessier/
 
In comes Boris Gundelach, with over 22 years application and web development within the USA and Europe. Boris Gundelach resume is impressive 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/couchworx/
Boris brings to the table, platform architecture, app UI/UX & development using Xcode/Swift, Android Studio/Kotlin and Xamarin/C#. And backend development using AWS and Google Firebase as a basis, ERP solutions, product development experience customizing applications for small and medium enterprises in all industries

I was lucky to find him. With his technology skill set, he made my dreams come true. It was a fusion of my vision and his technological artistry, creating an ultimate marine forecasting app allowing users to keep in touch with mother ocean and bring empowerment to marine weather prediction. 

We are committed to the the crowdfunding community, and look forward to delivering more advanced functions, providing supporters high quality features time after time.

 
Timeline: What We've Achieved and Aim to Achieve

April 2019: Surveyed multiple user groups (surfers’) to find out what they liked within a working app. Then designed a swell forecasting app around that focus - understanding their issues, workflow processes, goals and preferences we can up with a user interface.
May 2019 - July 2019: completed and polished the user interface design based on the the user groups then we hosted a focus group for feedback. We received positive feedback and made minor adjustments. Most users needed certain requirements and services so we built that into our apps environment capturing needs of the user therefore helping customers to engage more within the app. 
July 2019: officially released app on the Apple Store for world wide prototype feedback - We received personal positive feedback and Great! 5 star reviews.
August 2019: Continued working on interface features and polishing from world wide focus groups feedback
September 2019: Full working app - testing, quality control and refined from focus groups feedback. We received rave reviews
September 2019 - 2020: Adding new features and functions and refinement from user feedback
January 2020: We launch our Indiegoggo campaign
February 2020: We develop a complete working Apple watch version
April 2020: We will develop a complete working version for the Android mobile operating system and Metic System on the Android.

June 2020: We will develop a complete working Old Man’s OSX (Mac) Desktop version.

 

 
Why Crowdfunding  on INDIEGOGO?

PRE-ORDERS. The main purpose of this campaign is for promotional and pre-order activities. We are offering the project backers a unique opportunity to get our marine forecasting app at an incredibly attractive price ‘FREE! for LIFE” immediately during and at the end of the product campaign, before the app is put up for subscription. All pre-orders will also get a lifetime of new features and functions.
OUR GOALS - Your contributions will go towards funding the marketing of our existing fully functional app called the Old Man’s Surf Report (Old Man’s) for IOS mobile devices. 
With your help we will use the money to alert people who are unhappy with the existing big marine forecasting companies, and that they have a better choice
Our funding goal of $6,500 is our budget to accomplish the marketing of our app, targeting marine oriented print and social media products. 

GETTING THE WORD OUT. Indiegogo is a great way of facing and supporting our patrons.

Old Man’s have surveyed hundreds of user groups to find out what they liked within a working marine forecasting app.
Then we designed it around that focus - creating the highest performing product we can, but we can always improve.
We need more feedback from marine forecasters from all over the world to help us improve and make the greatest marine forecasting app in the world.
And you can help us accomplish this either by becoming a backer or giving feedback on our Instagram Page:

https://www.instagram.com/williampmessier/?hl=en
 

Creating Your Favorite Spot:

 

 
Why You Can Trust We’ll Deliver Updates Regularly:
All supporters, we are going to provide you this app for life!, which include future functions and features
We're going to keep on delivering you a better marine app. Here's why:

First, look at my passion for developing this marine forecasting app
The design of Old Man’s speaks to me, which means, I understand what users need and take my obligation to backers seriously.
Second, with a fully functional working app, and hundreds of happy backers, you can trust we are committed to delivering new versions and features as designed. Only better!
This isn't a prototype. This is a fully functional working version! We will actually produce better future versions

We have requests from existing users and will act on them.

We are a small company so it is easy to make decisions and turn our technology on a dime to change and move in that direction and to put that change into the next new version

This insures the latest technology is infused into our marine app. 
We take pride in personal service - it does not happen very often when users request help, but it is important for us to respond within an hour. We even provide a phone number. Who does that?

We have user defined designs by surfers for surfers. We researched our users, find out what they liked and designed a marine forecasting app around that focus and continue to do so

When you back us, you can trust this project will come to life. Don't hesitate to send us a message if you have any questions or concerns.
All we need is your support...
 
The Tech Guy Interviews Old Man's

 
Risks & Challenges
They are always there... but since we have a fully working functional program this risk is reduced. And no one within a crowdfunding campaign has ever said "these risks could end us!" Sorry, we are positive. We don't think the project is going to fail, for the reasons we outline below. But, there are a few important things you should know:

Life Happens - Life gets in the way and could slow down programming. As of today, we haven't detected it yet. We have made unbelievable strides overcoming huge obstacles with design and technology. We have a fully loaded functional working app with an unbelievable user interface.
Technology Issues - We are always looking to incorporate the latest technology into mobile devices. Can the new devices handle this new technology? One thing we understand, innovation never stops and adapting newer technology to existing mobile devices is a matter of working out the kinks on our end.
Getting Your Phone Model To Work - This is a risk. We design everything according to Apples’s recommendations. An iOS developer generally needs to have their apps work with the most recent models of iPhones. Developers need to support the most recent and last major release of iOS. The rule of thumb is that phones have a three-year life. With that in mind, “Old Man’s” will support IOS devices as low as iPhone 5.
Updating The App - To get the latest update with the latest cool features make sure your iPhone model is set to automatically updated by default. The iPhone 5 and above will allow you to do this in your settings. We are producing updates regularly with super cool features and function.
You Don't Like the App - There isn't a lot we can do about this one. But really, the app is awesome. We don’t know anyone who hasn’t loved it yet!

Those are the risks as we see them.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:


You can contribute by getting the word out and make some sounds about "Old Man's" send them to this campaign or at our website for a download (oldmanwaves.com).

There are some great Indiegogo share tools a click away!

It is as easy as that. Or, Support This Project
Support a project without expecting a reward because it speaks to you

story:
Hello, we’re the team at Fairbnb.coop . We are a digital cooperative working to facilitate authentic, sustainable and intimate travel experiences.

We all want to travel and see the world. Over the last years, the number of tourists and trips they take has grown rapidly. But while greater numbers of people have been able to access the luxury of travel, mass tourism has also brought difficult consequences for many cities.  



From Cape Town to Tokyo, New York to Barcelona, neighbourhoods have seen rising real estate prices, eroded communities, and displaced families.

In recent years, a variety of loosely-regulated online platforms have emerged to facilitate the short-term stays of tourists. But under the benign banner of allowing residents to belong anywhere, these platforms have facilitated this irresponsible model of tourism. For many citizens, the promise of ‘home-sharing’ has turned into ‘home-stripping’.

Resident associations, social movements, and municipalities have expressed growing preoccupation over tourism-fuelled gentrification and the deterioration of living conditions. Even the hospitality industry has started to acknowledge the problem of over-tourism.

Amidst this context, alternatives are emerging, as residents and urbanists begin to rethink and envision other models of tourism. Visions where tourism regenerates rather than despoils cities; where the hefty financial gains of the hospitality industry, are reinvested to benefit residents and transform their lived environments for the better.  

 

The Problem & Fairbnb.coop’s Solution

Conventional sharing platforms have three main problems:

First 
They are opaque. 

Second
They load costs onto communities,

Third
They are undemocratic.

Fairbnb.coop is designed to actively redress these problems, prioritising transparency, the distribution of benefits to communities, and democratic decision-making.

How do we do this?

First 
We collaborate with municipalities to ensure the legality of all rented homes and full compliance with local law.

Second
Half of the commission charged by Fairbnb.coop is returned to the local community, sustaining projects selected by local residents. From playgrounds to cultural centres, community gardens to women’s shelters, the income from travellers nourishes and regenerates communities.

Third
We are a cooperative, owned by our members. Our decisions are made collaboratively, and our salaries are capped. We have firm values and ethical policies we abide by. Through our network of local nodes, we empower local communities to shape the tourism that affects them, and ensure its benefits return to them.


The Funds

Fairbnb.coop’s journey started in 2016 as a movement seeking to create an equitable and lawful alternative to existing home-sharing platforms with a focus on commons and 100% respectful with legality. Although the movement initiated in Venice and Amsterdam, soon other groups from all over Europe joined the conversation and helped us shape the final model that we are seeking to implement.
 

In late 2018 we created a co-op to provide by the legal backbone entity behind a fair, collectively-owned and transparent booking platform. This platform will enable travellers to find lawful accommodations and facilitate meaningful travel opportunities while reinvesting 50% of its revenues to support local communities.

Fairbnb.coop today is a broad community of academics, activists, entrepreneurs, coders, researchers and designers, all united by a common desire to bring ‘share’ back into the sharing economy. Our diverse team has expertise across a range of disciplines, coupled with decades of experience bringing sustainable enterprises and social initiatives to life.

Our commitment to crafting an alternative that is sustainable, innovative accountable to communities has led us to avoid big angel investors and venture capital. Instead, we have relied on cooperative funding on our journey so far, with our own members providing over €100,000 to establish the initiative.

We are now raising funds to get Fairbnb.coop over the finish line, to ensure that the platform can be launched in the best way possible, and sustainable to stay on its fair tricks.

 

Making a Difference

Beyond supporting this crowdfunding, there is a range of things you can do to support the development of Fairbnb.coop. You can spread the word about this initiative to this friends, you can sign up to be among the first people to use the platform, or you can even establish a local node to bring Fairbnb.coop to your city. For more information see here.

story:
What if there was a bag that could carry everything you need?

 

That's the question we asked ourselves when designing the ultimate duffle bag for work, fitness, and travel. The idea came from being frustrated with Carrying 4 separate bags to function throughout the day.    Through months of trial and error, we finally came up with a product that bridges the gap between function and style.

Let us introduce to you the Hustleandfit Multipuprose Duffel. A bag that truly supports fitness lovers with a busy life.

Learn more about this revolutionary new product below:

 

We build products that solve problems. Each feature was carefully designed to support the lives of busy professionals who care about staying fit. Our passion for helping people is shown in every aspect of our design. That's why we would love for you to join us.   

The Hustleandfit Multipurpose Duffle has multiple compartments for shoes, a suit, a laptop, food, workout clothes, and much more. This premium Duffle combines 4 bags in one, built to avoid the stress of carrying multiple bags separately.

Carry everything you need for the gym, travel, and work:

Includes Inner Garment Bag for ease of transporting suits and jackets

Holds 13-17" laptop in a hidden compartment for safety and security

Sized for Carry-on airplane luggage

Insulated meal compartment to easily carry food

Dozens of features designed for on the go fit professional

The external bag features a meal compartment, shoe holder, luggage sleeve, backpack straps, and additional pockets.  

 

The Internal bag features a garment pocket, laptop sleeve, pocket flap for vitamins, or a tie. It also has an internal water bottle holder with a drawstring and a pocket for small items which includes cell phones. 

 

 

The Hustleandfit Multipurpose Duffle also includes a portable laundry bag for dirty clothes, a vitamin container, and a multipurpose shaker cup.

  

Our Story

 

 

I am Hustleandfit 

David Walcott created the Hustleandfit Multipurpose Duffel as a result of being frustrated with carrying 4 different bags to function throughout the day.  David developed the prototype using the experiences of a small test group and his own personal challenges. The concept worked well, so he worked on refining the design and product distribution.

The Hustleandfit Philosophy

Having it all is the philosophy of Hustleandfit.  The name speaks to the heart of what's needed to succeed in life, which is a strong work ethic and a healthy body. Everything you need is within. Hustleandfit is beyond one single product.  It is a way of life.

 

The Hustleandfit Community

Our goal when creating Hustleandfit was to develop products that were well designed, stylish, and functional.  We also wanted to create a community of people that care about self-development. Know that each pledge you make is supporting a vision to help others achieve their goals.

 

Join us on:

 

Warranty 

 

We stand by our work. We will repair or replace the appropriate part(s) if your Hustleandfit Multipurpose Duffel product fails as a result of defective materials or workmanship under normal use within 2 years of purchase.

 

Should this happen, contact us with your proof of purchase and explain the problem, and we will get back to you just as soon as possible.

 

This product is patent pending and all rights reserved.

story:
Taskin Xpress: Say Goodbye to The Ordinary 

Here's a little backstory on this new product: When our Taskin Kruze toiletry bag campaign became an instant success, we started receiving requests for a smaller, more compact companion to this breakthrough bag. One with many of the same things everybody loves about Kruze—but suited for shorter trips and carry-on only travels.

So, by popular demand, we're amped to introduce the Taskin Xpress.

 

At Taskin, we've got a track record in developing innovative, high-quality products at a reasonable price. But don’t take it from us. Just look at what our backers say about our previous campaigns:

 

Awesomeness, Xpress

 

Just look at the stand-out features you get with Taskin Xpress:

As with all our other products, our primary focus is always to bring you outstanding and innovative travel gear. The same is true for Xpress, which comes complete with:

Kruze-style Suctioning

Four powerful suction cups allow you to attach Xpress to any smooth surface—the bathroom mirror, the tile next to the shower, you name it. Now, everything you need is always within easy reach. And once you see how hanging your bag away from the counter helps keep your stuff stay clean and dry? Let's just say you won't be the first Taskin backer to fight back tears of joy.

With four 3 cms sized suction cups the Xpress will stay up for weeks.

Detachable, TSA-Friendly Toiletry Pouch

An easily detachable, TSA-compliant waterproof pouch can be affixed to Xpress—even with the zipper up—for fast, convenient security screening. Everybody else's toiletry bags have some explaining to do.

High-Density Packing

In-spite of its compact size, the Xpress can fit far more than you would expect. The multiple pockets also allows you to better organize your stuff and easily access them when needed. Usability has never been so useful.

Expandable Construction for 30% More Space

High-quality construction means you can expand the inside volume up to 30%. Which means you can pack more when you need to—and save space when you don't. Plus, the elasticity of our premium materials keeps all your toiletries in place. And hallelujah for that.

Metallic Inner Lining

Xpress comes lined with an advanced, polyester coating with a layer of aluminum to improve visibility and to help keep the inside dry and microbe-free. Plus it just looks cool.

Tough, Waterproof Materials

The exterior is premium, waterproof tarpaulin. The inside mesh is PVC. And the inner lining is metalized polyester. Which means Xpress is highly water- and mess-resistant. And you can really use that. Just saying.

The Perfect Gift

Xpress come beautifully packaged and would be the perfect gift for the traveler in your life.

Specifications

Add Our Dual-Sided Packing Cubes & Fit 40% More In The Same Space 

 

 

Miss out on our big campaign for the Kompak packing cube? Have some but want more? here's your chance to fix that!"

Pack tight and get where you're going without having to steam or iron wrinkled clothes for a change!

On one side: An air-breathable compartment to keep clothes packed tight and wrinkle-free. On the other: An odor and water resistant pouch with waterproof zippers and lining, so you can keep your damp and dirties away from your dry and cleans. 

 

With dual-side compression, you can pack 40% more in the same amount of space. Which means you get double thee awesome in one ultra-compression cube.

Rewards

Guaranteed on time shipping

We guarantee your Taskin Xpress will ship from our factory on or before the estimated date—or you can get a full refund. The estimated date provided is the date we ship from the factory, the date you receive your reward will vary depending on your shipping country.

EU friendly shipping

Rewards for our EU backers will ship from UK and we will take care of VAT and customs.

Risks & Challenges

While we expect this campaign to run like clockwork, there are always a few risks involved, such as the possibility that:

  • We run into production issues—like NASA buying up the global supply of metalized polyester
  • Customs holds our shipments for a few weeks until we get a chance to pay the ransom
  • Our kids make a giant squishy-ball with all our shipping labels (looking at you, Alex)

We've done our best to mitigate these risks by working with a high-end manufacturer that produces gear for major brands. We're using well-established shipping companies that know the ins-and-outs of customs. And yes, we're hiding all the shipping labels from Alex.

If challenges do occur, rest assured we'll do our utmost to minimize any delays and to ship your toiletry bag by the estimated time—or you get your money back.

Hey, we didn't call it Xpress for nothing.
story_txt:
Taskin Xpress: Say Goodbye to The Ordinary 
Here's a little backstory on this new product: When our Taskin Kruze toiletry bag campaign became an instant success, we started receiving requests for a smaller, more compact companion to this breakthrough bag. One with many of the same things everybody loves about Kruze—but suited for shorter trips and carry-on only travels.
So, by popular demand, we're amped to introduce the Taskin Xpress.
 

At Taskin, we've got a track record in developing innovative, high-quality products at a reasonable price. But don’t take it from us. Just look at what our backers say about our previous campaigns:

 

Awesomeness, Xpress

 
Just look at the stand-out features you get with Taskin Xpress:
As with all our other products, our primary focus is always to bring you outstanding and innovative travel gear. The same is true for Xpress, which comes complete with:
Kruze-style Suctioning

Four powerful suction cups allow you to attach Xpress to any smooth surface—the bathroom mirror, the tile next to the shower, you name it. Now, everything you need is always within easy reach. And once you see how hanging your bag away from the counter helps keep your stuff stay clean and dry? Let's just say you won't be the first Taskin backer to fight back tears of joy.
With four 3 cms sized suction cups the Xpress will stay up for weeks.
Detachable, TSA-Friendly Toiletry Pouch


An easily detachable, TSA-compliant waterproof pouch can be affixed to Xpress—even with the zipper up—for fast, convenient security screening. Everybody else's toiletry bags have some explaining to do.
High-Density Packing

In-spite of its compact size, the Xpress can fit far more than you would expect. The multiple pockets also allows you to better organize your stuff and easily access them when needed. Usability has never been so useful.
Expandable Construction for 30% More Space

High-quality construction means you can expand the inside volume up to 30%. Which means you can pack more when you need to—and save space when you don't. Plus, the elasticity of our premium materials keeps all your toiletries in place. And hallelujah for that.
Metallic Inner Lining

Xpress comes lined with an advanced, polyester coating with a layer of aluminum to improve visibility and to help keep the inside dry and microbe-free. Plus it just looks cool.
Tough, Waterproof Materials

The exterior is premium, waterproof tarpaulin. The inside mesh is PVC. And the inner lining is metalized polyester. Which means Xpress is highly water- and mess-resistant. And you can really use that. Just saying.
The Perfect Gift

Xpress come beautifully packaged and would be the perfect gift for the traveler in your life.
Specifications

Add Our Dual-Sided Packing Cubes & Fit 40% More In The Same Space 

 

 
Miss out on our big campaign for the Kompak packing cube? Have some but want more? here's your chance to fix that!"
Pack tight and get where you're going without having to steam or iron wrinkled clothes for a change!

On one side: An air-breathable compartment to keep clothes packed tight and wrinkle-free. On the other: An odor and water resistant pouch with waterproof zippers and lining, so you can keep your damp and dirties away from your dry and cleans. 

 
With dual-side compression, you can pack 40% more in the same amount of space. Which means you get double thee awesome in one ultra-compression cube.
Rewards

Guaranteed on time shipping
We guarantee your Taskin Xpress will ship from our factory on or before the estimated date—or you can get a full refund. The estimated date provided is the date we ship from the factory, the date you receive your reward will vary depending on your shipping country.
EU friendly shipping
Rewards for our EU backers will ship from UK and we will take care of VAT and customs.

Risks & Challenges
While we expect this campaign to run like clockwork, there are always a few risks involved, such as the possibility that:

We run into production issues—like NASA buying up the global supply of metalized polyester
Customs holds our shipments for a few weeks until we get a chance to pay the ransom
Our kids make a giant squishy-ball with all our shipping labels (looking at you, Alex)

We've done our best to mitigate these risks by working with a high-end manufacturer that produces gear for major brands. We're using well-established shipping companies that know the ins-and-outs of customs. And yes, we're hiding all the shipping labels from Alex.
If challenges do occur, rest assured we'll do our utmost to minimize any delays and to ship your toiletry bag by the estimated time—or you get your money back.
Hey, we didn't call it Xpress for nothing.

story:
We Are Building and Equipping a New Gymnasium in Zimbabwe 

  • Drastic Gymnastics is a club that has 7 full time coaches, which teaches 3 main disciplines and have been teaching the children of Harare for over 10 years now under the the club name. 
  • We have been given notice to leave our current venue within 90 days.
  • This comes as a shocking blow for us and our community, as loosing this building will signify the closure of the last equipped artistic gymnastics gymnasium in Zimbabwe
  • So as the head coach and founder, I have taken on the task of building a new gymnasium that is designed for artistic gymnastics and is fully equipped with a pit and all training aids and equipment.
  • While the new gym's main function is Artistic Gymnastics it has been designed so it can also be used by Rhythmic, Trampolining and Aerobic gymnastics and have a full pre school and early development section as none of these disciplines have a permanent venue in Zimbabwe.
  • With Drastic Gymnastics being one of the leading clubs in Zimbabwe we are one of the main channels for those who go on to represent the country and we are involved in the bulk of the grassroots and development of gymnastics in Harare, so this building will help more then just the current group of gymnasts. It will help gymnastics grow.

We already have the land in place for the gymnasium , all we need now is a floor under our feet and a roof over our heads and the club will be back to coaching all the various levels and disciplines of gymnastics

Gymnasts of Drastic Gymnastics whom are all training to compete for Zimbabwe in various levels and disciplines but soon will have no gymnasium to train in.

Why are we Building a new Gymnasium in Zimbabwe and Why you should be a part of It 

I have seen the affect gymnastics has had on the young individuals of Zimbabwe and how it has enabled them to change the direction of their lives no matter what back ground they are coming from or what is going on in our country at that time. Over the years I have been on a journey with many of the youths of Harare and it is incredible to be able to witness and support a young boy or girl rise from one of Harare’s many high density housing areas, and defy all the odds stacked against them. For them to then go on to become both a national champion and a nationals icon of hope and strength as they represent their nation.

This is why we are building a new centre, to be able to keep training these gymnasts and nurturing their dreams of success and greatness.


Through gymnastics we have seen children turn around their lives at school, teenagers stay off the streets and go onto college and university and individuals go on to be the bread winners of their families.

So we are more then just asking you to be part of building a building, we are offering you the unique opportunity to be part of these young individuals growth and reform, to be part of keeping the sport of gymnastics alive in Zimbabwe AND to have your name forever embossed on the building for all future generations of gymnasts to see as they arrive and leave the gymnasium each day.

                         


What We Are Aiming to Build and How

With us now not having a gymnasium for the gymnasts and team members to train in we intend to break the project down into 4 stages to allow training to continue as quickly as possible with as little disruption as possible

Stage 1 – Will be to lay a concrete slab floor and erect the steel frame with a chromadex roof. The building will be imported from the Republic of South Africa, while the floor will be made with all local material and building staff ( this will give us a floor and a roof where we can start training again ! ) The cost of stage 1 = $62 000

Stage 2 – Will be to build in the side walls of the gym up to 3.2m in Brick and then cladding with a mixture of perspex , opal and IBR sheeting to allow for natural lighting to keep our electrical usage to a minimum. The cost of stage 2 = $29 000.

Stage 3 – Will be to build within the steel frame the reception, ablutions, a viewing gallery and changing rooms. The cost of stage 3= $17 000

Stage 4 - Will be to fill the safety pit with foam that will be cast in Stage 1, purchase a full artistic floor as the club has been using a strip for the past 10 years, replace the apparatus mats as most of the ones the club uses are now over 15 years old and buy a new Set of Springboards, Uneven Bars, Parallel Bars and Pommel Horse .  The cost of stage 4 = $41 000

Once these four steps are complete the gymnasts of Harare will have a full artistic gymnastics gymnasium that they can train safely in.


The Long Term Impact of our Building

Firstly to have this level of building in Zimbabwe will raise the level of gymnastics in the country with the gymnasts being able to train and compete in a secure and safe environment.

As Drastic Gymnastics is one of the leading clubs in Zimbabwe, over the past 5 years the club's gymnasts have made up 89% of the country's national gymnastics team. 

The club also coaches the country's leading male gymnasts and have done from their introduction to the sport of gymnastics through the various outreach and development projects it has been involved in, up until their current standing on the Continental scene. It is there for essential that the club survives with a training venue to enable both the national team and our community based projects to continue.

On top of it all, this building is a legacy that will withstand the test of time, as it will be located centrally and will be accessible to all the future generations of gymnasts. Thus allowing them to excel in gymnastics and in their personal lives to then reach the highest levels of competition on a world stage, securing gymnastics as part of the future of sport in Zimbabwe.

How else can you help us???

We are not only looking for funds for our building................. 

We are looking for any kind of support for our project. So feel free to spread word and share this campaign page about what we are tying to build here in Africa, to raise the standard and quality of gymnastics in Zimbabwe.

Our gymnasts are also looking to get to know other gymnasts far and wide to share their training stories and make friends with other gymnasts world wide.

So if you feel you can help this project or the gymnasts of Drastic Gymnastics with kit, resources or knowledge, please get in contact with me or head along to our website www.drasticgymnastics.com and I will get straight back to you.

story:
Feel the Rush

of excitement as you barrel down the trails, catch air for the first time or just hang out with a few friends before taking a ride. Mountain biking, outdoor adventure at its best.

The Friends of the Huckleberry Trail and the Town of Blacksburg are launching a fund raising effort to build the only mountain biking skills park in southwest Virginia. The park, located off Meadowbrook Road at the base of the Jefferson National forest will be constructed in two phases. Phase one will offer over 3500 feet of trails and a 6,250 square foot pump park for all ages and skill levels. Phase two, to be constructed at a later date, will be an advanced skills course for more experienced riders.

The unique conceptual design was completed by Alpine Bike Parks of Canada to create a fun place to increase mountain biking skills. The park will allow riders to build their skill level by progressing through different trails and feature difficulties. It’s also a great warm up before heading out on a ride through the National Forest.


How You Can Help

The goal is to raise $20,000. These funds will provide a 20% match to a Virginia Department of Conservation and Recreation grant to build the first phase of the project. Construction could begin as early as summer 2016.

story:
This is really much more than a guide book. The history of the sport is briefly told, followed by chapters on safety, health issues, dog breeds and their adaptation to the sport, equipment, vehicles, training, training programs and conditioning, behavior problem solving, animal assisted therapy, backpacking, canicross, identifying and dealing with stress and more.

My name is Arie; I am a father of three, a lawyer by trade, musician, teacher, thematic stamp collector (“On sled dogs and dog sleds”, what else), certified international FCI dog judge and a keen dryland musher from Israel. I co-own and manage Dofunit, a company designing and manufacturing single shaft, dorsal hitch dog carts, harnesses, canicross belts and related dryland mushing gear.

Dofunit and I are dedicated to dog driving sports. Go! - THE Guide to Dryland Mushing, part of our mission and vision, was first published in Hebrew in 2012.  It is now translated into English, edited and ready to go down to print.

Having taught hundreds of dog owners and dogs to enjoy dryland mushing, and with some thirty years of varied experience and knowledge to share, I hope this book will get you going on your life's best ride.

story:
On the 25th of April 2015 (425), a magnitude 7.8 earthquake hit Nepal and changed the lives of its people forever.

Gareth, Laura, James and Richard found themselves in Nepal when the earthquake struck. Like many, they decided to stay and help where they could. 

During the weeks that followed, they found themselves delivering aid to those that had received nothing. Despite assisting numerous families in the days and weeks following the disaster, they had a desire to create something longer lasting; a project that would continue to raise funds for those in need.

'Nepal 425' is their project...
story_txt:
On the 25th of April 2015 (425), a magnitude 7.8 earthquake hit Nepal and changed the lives of its people forever.Gareth, Laura, James and Richard found themselves in Nepal when the earthquake struck. Like many, they decided to stay and help where they could. During the weeks that followed, they found themselves delivering aid to those that had received nothing. Despite assisting numerous families in the days and weeks following the disaster, they had a desire to create something longer lasting; a project that would continue to raise funds for those in need.'Nepal 425' is their project...'Nepal 425' is a project started by 4 people; but has quickly become a project created by hundreds. Help us make this a project created by thousands.
          By Supporting this campaign 'Nepal 425' becomes YOUR project...
Since May 2015 we have collated nearly 700 images from professional and amateur photographers of all nationalities. The best of these images will become the Nepal 425 Photo Book. It will create a work of cultural and topical relevance that will be showcased worldwide through the book and associated exhibitions. 
All proceeds from the book will go to help projects in Nepal through our local partner charity VolNepal.



"VolNepal is currently focusing on rebuilding schools which have been affected by the earthquake. As our mission is to build sustainable communities, we believe that targeting schools of earthquake affected areas is a step towards that goal. We believe it is very important for children to remain active and their minds to be constantly engaged. Thus, we are targeting schools in order to provide children the opportunity to rebuild, mingle with and learn from their peers and teachers, and above all, put the trauma of the earthquake behind and move forward in their lives."



Our Funding Goals:
We have started from small beginnings; but our ambitions are mountainous, and for good reason. We have been shown the true generosity of the people of Nepal; now its time for us to give back. 
Our primary goal is to print and sell 1,000 copies of the Nepal 425 photo book with all profits going to VolNepal. With further funding we will be able to print more books and in turn raise more money for VolNepal. 
We would love the opportunity not only to display these wonderful images as part of a book, but also to hold exhibitions around the world. These exhibitions would help to showcase the images in the book and further raise awareness and fundraising for Nepal. Additional contributions would allow us to cover the costs of holding exhitbitions About the Nepal 425 photo book:While there was massive loss of life and much devastation; Nepal 425 will show more than this. It will show the resilience and strength of the Nepali people, for which they are so well know. It will show the aid and relief the country has received and the people standing up and rebuilding their homes and their country together. 

Nepal remains one of the world's most beautiful countries, the quake hasn't changed that. Nepal 425 will help to encourage visitors back again. Tourism will provide much needed investment to help the country get back onto their feet.





Book Details:
Hard Cover - 12 x 12in - Approx. 150 pages
Printed and distributed through Blurb.com
Our team in the news:
"Nepal quake: What happens to those trying to help?"

"Nepal425 project looks to raise funds for country’s most at-risk areas"

"Nepal 425 - Three trekkers decided not to go home and stay on to help with earthquake relief"

"SA men pitch in to build homes in Nepalese village""Photographers Launch Nepal 425 Photo Book"


"An Alberta photographer in Nepal at the time of the earthquake turned her camera on the recovery and resilience of the people. Now she's assembling a book of photos to raise money for the recovery."
"Nepal 425 - a collaborative photo book"

story:
Je suis éducateur canin /comportementaliste et l'heureuse propriétaire de 5 chiens fantastiques, 4 d'entre eux sont des rescapés de la misère ou de l'euthanasie, et je ne pars plus en vacances ou ne serait-ce qu'en week-end, parce que tout simplement trouvé un hébergement qui accepte mes chiens relève de l'impossible, et partir sans eux est inimaginable.

De plus vu leurs passés respectifs, il est inenvisageable de les mettre en pension pendant une semaine, et le coût de la pension est un budget considérable.

Mon parcours d'éducateur/comportementaliste, m'a fait rencontrer un certain nombre de personnes dans ce cas qui ne partent plus ni en vacances ni en week-end.

De là, il y a trois ans m'est venu l'idée d'ouvrir un lieu de vacances pour les propriétaires de chiens. 

Le plus difficile était de trouver l'endroit idéal autant pour les propriétaires que pour les chiens, après de longue recherches je l'ai enfin trouvé.

Je souhaite faire de ce lieu, un endroit convivial, un lieu d'échanges et de partage, et aussi une solution pour éviter les abandons des périodes de vacances.

LE CONCEPT CANI-CAMPING  QU'EST CE QUE C'EST ?

Cani-camping est un lieu de  résidence de vacances en chambres d'hôtes ou mobiles-home ou bien encore en gîte,  réservé aux propriétaires de chiens, quelque soit la race et le nombre

*Chaque emplacement de mobile-home aura son jardin clos de 200 M2, pour une plus grande liberté de mouvement de chacun.

*Un terrain de détente de 2000 M2 entièrement clos avec un accès sécurisé  pour que les chiens puissent courir et s'ébattre en toute liberté, faire connaissance avec des congénères, tout simplement jouer.

*Un service de garderie à la demi-journée ou la journée,  pour que les propriétaires  de chiens puissent jouir d'activités extérieures, qui sont interdites aux chiens.

*Toutes les informations touristiques de la région  autorisées ou non en compagnie des chiens seront communiquées dès l'arrivée.

*Des cours d'éducation en groupe ou individuel, et des séances de comportements

*Hors saison des stages d'éducation et comportements, et tout au long de l'année divers stages d'initiation dans divers domaines.

*Un parcours d'activités pour les enfants, et les chiens

*Un espace baignade sécurisé pour les chiens, ainsi que des rivières à proximité.

Le tout aménagé sur un terrain entièrement clos d'1 hectare 7.

LE FINANCEMENT

Evidemment une telle structure demande des aménagements importants et obligatoires.

Le poste le plus important de ces aménagements est l'assainissement, les mobiles-home devant être reliés à une fosse septique de grosse capacité cela nécessite

 des travaux de terrassement, 

l'achat de cette fosse,

ainsi que les raccordements en eau et électricité aux mobiles-home

Le montant de ces travaux et l'achat de la fosse septique sont de 10.000 euros

Dans le cas ou cet objectif ne serait pas atteint, le montant récolté contribuera à une partie de ces aménagements.


Vos contributions m'éviteront de faire un prêt supplémentaire pour ces travaux, qui sont indispensables pour avoir toutes les autorisations d'installations.


L'OFFRE ET LA DEMANDE

A ce jour en France, aucun camping n'offre ces prestations, certains acceptent les chiens, souvent de taille moyenne et un seul chien.

La demande est bien présente, et l'offre n'existe pas.

Pour avancer dans ce projet j'ai préparé le site www.cani-camping.fr pour pouvoir le mettre en ligne dès l'ouverture, il n'a pas été partagé sur aucun réseau social, je n'en ai pas parler autour de moi, et malgré tout il atteint bientôt les 2000 visites uniquement par des personnes qui font des recherches d'hébergements de vacances avec leurs chiens.

La page Facebook quand à elle qui ne parle que du projet, le jour de son partage, auprès d'une cinquantaine de personnes à suscité plus de 700 partages en moins de 48 heures.

Je reçois de mails de demandes de réservations ... 

Ma motivation, ma ténacité, et mon amour pour les chiens sont indestructibles et je braverais encore les obstacles jusqu'à ce que ce projet voit le jour.

Il est vrai que les banques sont plutôt réservées, tout simplement parce qu'il n'y a pas de recul sur ce genre de projet et pour cause ...

Mais à contrario la forte demande, et ma motivation, m'aide à leurs démontrer que ce projet à de l'avenir.
story_txt: Je suis éducateur canin /comportementaliste et l'heureuse propriétaire de 5 chiens fantastiques, 4 d'entre eux sont des rescapés de la misère ou de l'euthanasie, et je ne pars plus en vacances ou ne serait-ce qu'en week-end, parce que tout simplement trouvé un hébergement qui accepte mes chiens relève de l'impossible, et partir sans eux est inimaginable.De plus vu leurs passés respectifs, il est inenvisageable de les mettre en pension pendant une semaine, et le coût de la pension est un budget considérable.Mon parcours d'éducateur/comportementaliste, m'a fait rencontrer un certain nombre de personnes dans ce cas qui ne partent plus ni en vacances ni en week-end.De là, il y a trois ans m'est venu l'idée d'ouvrir un lieu de vacances pour les propriétaires de chiens. Le plus difficile était de trouver l'endroit idéal autant pour les propriétaires que pour les chiens, après de longue recherches je l'ai enfin trouvé.Je souhaite faire de ce lieu, un endroit convivial, un lieu d'échanges et de partage, et aussi une solution pour éviter les abandons des périodes de vacances.LE CONCEPT CANI-CAMPING  QU'EST CE QUE C'EST ?Cani-camping est un lieu de  résidence de vacances en chambres d'hôtes ou mobiles-home ou bien encore en gîte,  réservé aux propriétaires de chiens, quelque soit la race et le nombre*Chaque emplacement de mobile-home aura son jardin clos de 200 M2, pour une plus grande liberté de mouvement de chacun.*Un terrain de détente de 2000 M2 entièrement clos avec un accès sécurisé  pour que les chiens puissent courir et s'ébattre en toute liberté, faire connaissance avec des congénères, tout simplement jouer.*Un service de garderie à la demi-journée ou la journée,  pour que les propriétaires  de chiens puissent jouir d'activités extérieures, qui sont interdites aux chiens.*Toutes les informations touristiques de la région  autorisées ou non en compagnie des chiens seront communiquées dès l'arrivée.*Des cours d'éducation en groupe ou individuel, et des séances de comportements*Hors saison des stages d'éducation et comportements, et tout au long de l'année divers stages d'initiation dans divers domaines.*Un parcours d'activités pour les enfants, et les chiens*Un espace baignade sécurisé pour les chiens, ainsi que des rivières à proximité.Le tout aménagé sur un terrain entièrement clos d'1 hectare 7.LE FINANCEMENTEvidemment une telle structure demande des aménagements importants et obligatoires.Le poste le plus important de ces aménagements est l'assainissement, les mobiles-home devant être reliés à une fosse septique de grosse capacité cela nécessite des travaux de terrassement, l'achat de cette fosse,ainsi que les raccordements en eau et électricité aux mobiles-homeLe montant de ces travaux et l'achat de la fosse septique sont de 10.000 eurosDans le cas ou cet objectif ne serait pas atteint, le montant récolté contribuera à une partie de ces aménagements.Vos contributions m'éviteront de faire un prêt supplémentaire pour ces travaux, qui sont indispensables pour avoir toutes les autorisations d'installations.L'OFFRE ET LA DEMANDEA ce jour en France, aucun camping n'offre ces prestations, certains acceptent les chiens, souvent de taille moyenne et un seul chien.La demande est bien présente, et l'offre n'existe pas.Pour avancer dans ce projet j'ai préparé le site www.cani-camping.fr pour pouvoir le mettre en ligne dès l'ouverture, il n'a pas été partagé sur aucun réseau social, je n'en ai pas parler autour de moi, et malgré tout il atteint bientôt les 2000 visites uniquement par des personnes qui font des recherches d'hébergements de vacances avec leurs chiens.La page Facebook quand à elle qui ne parle que du projet, le jour de son partage, auprès d'une cinquantaine de personnes à suscité plus de 700 partages en moins de 48 heures.Je reçois de mails de demandes de réservations ... Ma motivation, ma ténacité, et mon amour pour les chiens sont indestructibles et je braverais encore les obstacles jusqu'à ce que ce projet voit le jour.Il est vrai que les banques sont plutôt réservées, tout simplement parce qu'il n'y a pas de recul sur ce genre de projet et pour cause ...Mais à contrario la forte demande, et ma motivation, m'aide à leurs démontrer que ce projet à de l'avenir.

story:
Project Aim:To engage a larger audience in the giving process.

Vision

‘Wouldn't it be great if we could use our smartphones to help others by just clicking’ states Gareth Llewelyn CEO.

We developed the ValueBond™ App where everyone could give to their project for FREE. This app allows users to scan or click ValueBonded barcodes to get cash rewards or enable donations to charity. All the funds are provided by 180 advertising and business sponsors.

ValueBond™ conceived ‘Crowd Bonding™’… the crowd acting in unison! 

People click on ValueBonded barcodes to Crowd Fund

Our Achievements

We have over 20,000 users in the UK who have tested our own ValueBond™ code for Tickets, Wristbands, Pubs, Glasses, Charity donations, Facebook pages, Twitter accounts and Bank cards.

We re-purposed existing barcodes on Dvds, Cds,Games, Food Products, Magazines, Newspapers, Medicines, and Drinks cans.

We have delivered: incentivised views of videos, survey Completion, footfall increase, voucher delivery, app downloads, registrations, Facebook likes, Facebook boot-up, Charity donation.

Where are we?

We need your help to market this product on all the funding platforms allowing everyone to participate in the giving and funding process for FREE.

story:
Our Mission


         We offer a space without intimidation for the inexperienced cyclist and experienced cyclist alike. Our central location will enable us to help commuters, downtown residents and those riding the nearby bike trails. We'll provide the community with information on cycling awareness and year round cycling sustainment and activities.


Bike Passion


       I think bikes are the ultimate form of transportation. I love working on bikes, there's always something new to learn or problem solve. I have collected an assortment of experience over the past decade and a half; working in shops, fixing friend's bikes, and friends of friend's bikes. I've been an avid bike commuter for nearly 20 years, and I have over 15 years experience as a courier. I've negotiated traffic and fixed flats in hailstorms, and I've spent many hours on the trails. Now it's time for the next bike chapter in my life, owning my own bike shop.

       The location of the shop is 124 E. Long Street, once home to B1 Bicycles. They closed their doors in October of 2015 after 8 years of operation. Losing the convenience of it's central location and proximity to nearby trails, it was a great loss to many Columbus cyclists and commuters. Opening a shop in that location is an opportunity  to continue to provide a service to the community, and create a inclusive environment for all cyclists.


Funding Breakdown

       Reaching a $10, 000 goal will allow us to purchase shop tools, basic inventory and necessary fixtures, and a POS system. Roughly 1/3 of the funds will be used for an initial batch of tools, the pinnacle of our trade. $2000 will be used to stock the shelves the basics like helmets, tubes, tires, lights, and fenders. Let's not forget repair shop necessities like cables, housing, grease, screws, spacers, bearings, industry level repair manuals, and so forth. We plan to have a core of used bikes on the floor tuned up in-house, and $1500 will go toward purchasing up to 30 bikes of all varieties. The remaining funds will be used to purchase a POS system and shop fixtures.

       Our Perks are services and discounts that range from $5 to $1000. Services such as tube/tire installation and tune ups are offered. Upper level perks offer store credit with bonus savings. Swag! We are going to print up stickers, fliers, and T-shirts to help spread the word about the shop. 
 

Risks, Challenges, And Other Ways You Can Help
   
       $10, 000 is only 25% of the average startup funds needed to start a small business, and will get us past the initial hump. Using an accumulated sense of efficiency and frugality, I will keep purchases basic and necessary, the flair will be in the excitement in seeing more bikes on the road!  Even if you don't have biking needs you can still help out. Perks can be transferred to friends and relatives, or given as a gift. Or simply help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word just in time for the season!

Thanks for your support!

-Chad

story:
New Development: Gibbon is excited to announce faster turnaround times for backers!

Worried that you won't get your carrier in time for your Summer family getaway? We've got you covered! Our initial production schedule put us at a September 2016 delivery. However, we're listening when you say you don't want to wait until this fall. We've been exploring some advanced production techniques, such as digitized patterns, that will enable us to deliver our carriers to backers by July 2016! 


Like us on Facebook!

Follow us on Twitter!

Hi, I’m Christian Brodin, Founder of the Gibbon Child Carriers! After two years of working our butts off, we’ve harnessed the best of technology and design to provide an amazing solution to problems that parents experience getting their kids from points A to B.

Without further adieu, we present the fruits of our labor and invite you to join us on our journey to make the Gibbon Child Carrier the ultimate carrier for parents on the move with small children!


As parents, we want to share all of our adventures with our children. However, moving around with them can be a challenge as they get older and heavier. When they become tired or hungry, a family outing can fall apart quickly.

Little voices saying "Mom, Dad, I'm tired! Can you carry me?" can be a certain death rattle for a pleasant family outing. Not to mention, juggling shopping bags, car seats, suitcases and backpacks can be incredibly tiring and add stress to even the most simple family adventures.

We’re excited to tell you that being out with your children doesn’t have to be a burden! Whether it’s a daily train commute, picking them up from preschool, a trip to the museum or exploring of the streets of Paris, the Gibbon Carrier is the solution that parents traveling with young children have been asking for! 



This campaign is very important to us because only a couple of years ago while traveling with our son and trying other carriers, we saw a need for innovation. All the carriers we tried were bulky, difficult to use, or they made us too physically hot and sweaty.  We decided to dedicate all of our time and energy to developing the ultimate next-generation child carrier. 

We wanted the smallest, most lightweight and easy to use carrier to solve this problem once and for all.

Materials, features & use

The Gibbon Carrier is the first high-quality, ultra-smart, and ultra-light compact carrier built for children 2-5 years old that’s quick to deploy, comfortable, and easy to use. With a Gibbon Carrier, you can venture off the beaten path and enjoy long hikes and picnics in hard-to-reach places without the burden.

Compact and easy to deploy 

The Gibbon Child Carrier easily and carefully folds up into a small drawstring bag with a carabiner that can be then be clipped onto your belt loop or put into your day bag. When you need it, you simply unfold it and it’s ready to use!

As a parent, your mind is constantly occupied making sure your child is cared for and safe. When stressful situations arise, the last thing you want to be burdened with the task of deploying a carrier. We wanted to make the Gibbon Carrier as easy to use and intuitive as possible.

Once a child steps into the carrier, he or she can then be carried piggy-back style while all the while keeping the parent’s hands free for other tasks, such as shopping for groceries, ordering lunch at a cafe, or handling luggage. When you're all done, you simply just fold it back up into itself and clip it onto your belt loop or toss it into your day bag.

Build Quality

We wanted to make a carrier that was smooth and well designed but also sturdy. Quality is extremely important to us, and we value products that are not only pleasing to use, but also last for a life time!

Inspired by popular adventure gear from quality brands such as Patagonia and Arcteryx, we work with materials that are not only tough but also come in colors and patterns that are appealing to both children and adults. All our carriers are made by hand in the US. Every seam and stitch is made with quality and strength in mind. Because of our extreme attention to detail, the carrier is built to last so you can use it for years to come as your child grows.

Designed in Oslo Norway and hand-assembled in Portland, Oregon, it has been tested with parents and children across the globe. 

Reviews & field research

We asked parents to try out our carrier to see what they thought. The parents who participated were both men and women between 25-40 years old and ranging in height and weight from small 5'4" and 115lbs to 5'8" and  180lbs.

All children tested were between the ages of 3 and 5 and weighed around 37lbs. Here's  a sampling of the reactions we heard!

Portability

"I liked how small it was. Very easy to carry around and can easily stick in my purse."

Size, comfort and design

"I was surprised how well my child's weight was distributed on my back ... I've used all sorts of baby/child carriers and they seem to hurt my back and shoulders quickly."

Use

"I could see the Gibbon Carrier being great in a lot of situations, especially for early toddlers."
"I would bring it if I know we'll need to be out during nap time."
"Definitely excited that this will be on the market for parents!"

We also got some amazing feedback and ideas on how to further our designs for additional comfort, design and ease of use. With contributions from this campaign, we can really get to work and use the information we gathered to perfect the design very quickly and effectively. Here's the breakdown.

We’ve turned to IndieGoGo to open our idea to an awesome community of other savvy parents from across the globe. We want to learn from you, and with your support, we can make a truly revolutionary child carrier that can improve the lives of parents everywhere.

The Gibbon Child Carrier is almost ready for mass production, but only your help will get us there! We have expertise in developing new products and ideas, and we have partnered with experienced manufacturers and designers to make them a reality. All together, we can make this happen!

All contributions from this campaign will be spent on product development, testing, certification, production and marketing, and building a full line of products. Our aim is to sell the Gibbon Child Carrier all over the world. By ensuring we meet the strictest guidelines for quality and safety, we have an opportunity to do this.

Throughout the campaign, we’ll be pushing for some stretch goals.

When you back this campaign, you’re helping build a foundation on which we can build a company that can do more to benefit the world. The Gibbon Child Carrier is only the beginning. Now that we have the expertise, the access to top-notch materials and construction methods, we can begin to explore other industries that can benefit from the technology. When you fund us, you're not just making life easier for parents. You're part of an impact that will be felt in other markets.

You can also support us by helping us spread the work on Facebook and Twitter. Please make good use of the social sharing buttons on this campaign. We’ll love you for it!

Like us on Facebook!

Follow us on Twitter!

What’s in it for you?

What would IndieGoGo be without some amazing rewards? We’ve put together some good ones, including premier access to a Gibbon Child Carrier (or two) of your own! The target retail price of a Gibbon Child Carrier is $150, but the first 25 backers will be able to get theirs for $125! So act fast, when they're gone, they're gone. 


We have some other great rewards, though, so don't worry. For the duration of this campaign, this will be THE EXCLUSIVE PLACE for pre-ordering your very own Gibbon Carrier! 

Be sure to keep your eyes peeled for some new exciting rewards that will be announced by March 3 as well as a survey for custom colors, etc! We have a few other tricks up our sleeve, too, so get ready.

What's the next step?

Trusted manufacturing partners with vast experience are ready and standing by to help us bring the Gibbon Child Carrier to your doorstep.

  • February/March: Finalize design and engineering through more product testing by parents, and fund our dream!

  • April: Complete testing and international quality control certifications, including certification to sell to children.

  • May/June: Pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.

  • July: Begin order fulfillment!

When we first began designing the carrier, we realized that it was quickly starting to resemble a gibbon monkey, swinging through the trees. It is also a reference to how gibbons carry their young. They are in a perpetual embrace. 

This is also telling of our long term mission, which is to bring families closer together by allowing them to focus on all of life's precious moments and less on the woes of child mobility.

Our Journey

When my wife and I had our son, Magnus, we wanted do all of the things we love to do, but we wanted him to be able to enjoy them, too. We wanted to take him with us wherever we might go, and have him be part of our adventures and experiences.  

By time he was about two years old, he was starting to get bigger and heavier which made traveling with him more difficult. We were carrying him a lot, which was uncomfortable and tiring for everyone. We tried to solve it by purchasing several different makes and models of strollers and child carriers, but we quickly noticed that a lot of the solutions out there weren’t working for us and were cutting into the time we were supposed to be enjoying together.

Strollers, car seats and bulky backpacks can be difficult to travel with and take up a lot of space in vehicles, overhead compartments and in crowded trains, trams and buses.

In some instances, just having a stroller can have a negative impact on your travel plans. One time when boarding a plane to Paris, we were asked to pay an additional $5 just to check our stroller. Running through the airport with our infant son asleep in a stroller in addition to our check baggage was already taking it’s toll, and suddenly we were hit with this extra inconvenience.

On the ground in Paris, the stroller struggle continued. Many of the streets are cobblestone and are difficult to navigate with a stroller. On several occasions, our son nearly fell out from all the vibration. Needless to say he wasn’t able to nap much while we explored on foot, which bore its own challenges.

The final straw

Some time later when we were back home in Seattle, my wife called me one day after having accompanied some friends to the airport. She had taken our son along with her but he had become exhausted and inconsolable. She was so tired of having carried him around that she was almost in tears as she spoke to me. They had boarded the train a while ago and she decided to ride it around for nearly an hour to let him sleep and so that she didn’t have to carry him.

We were getting fed up. We began to ask “Why isn’t there something better?” Our son was already too big for many other carriers, and a stroller wasn’t always the best option. We decided to take matters into our own hands and design a solution for ourselves.

The Journey from concept to prototype

We teamed up with Physical, an industrial design company with an eye for the future in Oslo, Norway. They listened to our needs and designed the first Gibbon Carrier, which resembled a Gibbon with its arms outstretched.

In addition to helping us to conceptualize a sleek and stylish carrier, they built and tested the first prototypes with parents, teachers and children at Ruselokka Kindergarten. Through multiple rounds of testing they were able to figure out what works with real people in real situations.

Our next challenge was figuring out how to have it manufactured. We were specifically looking for a company who would pay incredible attention to detail and perform highest possible quality work, down to every stitch. We eventually partnered with B.A.G. Accessories Group in Portland, Oregon. 

The product evolved again and is now the Gibbon Carrier you see today!

It’s truly been a labor of love! But now, with your help, we can take it to the next level and put this awesome carrier into the hands of parents everywhere.

With your support, the Gibbon Carrier can become the ultimate next-generation child carrier!


Risks and Challenges

We have been working for more than 2 years developing The Gibbon Child Carrier and getting it ready for production. We know what the next steps are for manufacturing and fulfillment and have great partners ready to start.

We will undoubtedly have surprises on our journey, but we trust that we have the team to overcome all challenges, as we’ve done so far. Our goal is to make the best possible product and deliver it right on time. 

Manufacturing

This process is complex and requires time and money. Complications could potentially emerge and delay the manufacturing schedule. To tackle this risk, we've selected partners that can work closely with us through the whole process.

Certification

Selling products to children requires the highest commitment to quality and safety. In every step of the design and production process we have focused on working with only the best people and advisors and using only the best materials and manufacturers. Still, challenges could arise when the product is tested in a laboratory that could delay our certification, and thus production and launch.
