Because of its synthetic design and complete flexibility before curation, carbon fiber enables us to make a board that is not only stronger, lighter, and 100% waterproof, but also one that is completely shapeable to any curvature or concave we can imagine (a huge limitation with wooden models). The idea got us really excited, and we started looking into the reality of actually producing such a board on our own. To our surprise we only found a few garage-shop direct competitors, half of which weren’t even located in the US. In the winter of 2016 we took the idea and ran with it. Paul (then a senior in college) used the board as the flagship product of hypothetical company created for an entrepreneurship class at Indiana University's Kelley School of Business. The company incorporated in February of 2016, and in a few months' time the siblings had drafted a rough 3D sketch of the board, conducted market research, organized a business plan with full-fledged marketing and entry-to-market strategies, secured a strategic partnership with a prominent carbon fiber manufacturer in Indianapolis, and hand-made a prototype board deck out of carbon fiber.  In April, Paul delivered a pitch on behalf of the company to a panel of investors, resulting in a trip to San Diego, CA to meet with executives of some of the biggest and best companies in the industry (including Sector 9, Muir Skate, and more) as well as retailers and board shop owners on the coast. Since the trip to the West Coast in June of 2016, BlackCraft has been hard at work revising, submitting, re-revising, and re-submitting our design to our manufacturing partner. Finally, in March of this year the company received the green light to begin production.  So What Now?We have spent the past year setting in place all of the factors necessary to launch and grow this company. Our last hurdle is an initial startup cost to cover the expenses of a manufacturing mold to be made for our board frames. Once we are able to purchase this mold, we will be able to manufacture boards with only manufacturing costs.

story:
Being Small is Key

We wanted to design a bottle opener that was small, like really small. We wanted to design a bottle opener that was still strong, like really strong. Enter Pry.Me, a penny-sized grade 5 titanium bottle opener. Pry.Me is the size of a penny and the thickness of two pennies. Despite its small size, Pry.Me is able to hold up to 164,000 times its own weight. Two Pry.Me openers hooked together have pulled a car across a parking lot and one hooked to a tree has held a 180lb friend off of the ground. On top of this, we are offing Pry.Me in a special finish called Orbital Grey. The finish was developed for use on the NASA solar arrays currently up in space. We found the company that applied this for NASA, explained our story, and are now able to offer this extremely unique finish on our Orbital Grey Pry.Me Bottle Opener.

If you want a penny-sized bottle opener that is made from grade 5 titanium, can hold up to 164,000 times its own weight, can pull a car across a parking lot, and comes in a finish developed for NASA, then this is the keychain bottle opener for you.

Go ahead, clean up your bottle opening game with Pry.Me!

 

Specifications

Don't have your ruler handy? Pry.Me is:

  • The diameter of a penny
  • The thickness of two pennies
  • 145% lighter than a penny
  • Way cooler than a penny

 

Finish Options

Available in Original (No Color) or Fancy (Color) finishes.

Pry.Me in Fuschia, Original, Blue, Gold, Orbital Grey

 

 

Put it to the Test!

Car Pull: To demonstrate the strength of Pry.Me, we hooked two openers together and used them to pull a car. Overkill, yes. Cool, most certainly.

 

Packaging

We have shipped over 11,000 Pry.Me bottle openers to 19 different countries. We ship USPS First Class (which includes tracking) in a 6"x8" white envelope. If you order 5 or more items we ship using a 1"x6"x8" white box.

 

What People Are Saying

 

“Works perfectly! It’s so small you won’t even realize you have it on your keychain until you need it!” – Kim

“Went straight from the mailbox to my fridge, it is awesome!” – Robert

“Like is definitely a understatement. I love my Pry.Me!” – Samuel

"Works GREAT! And, I forget it’s on my key chain most of the time :)” – Ryan

“Thank you for a great product. These things are TINY. Pictures can’t show how small they are.” – Tim

“Received two days ago in Italy, works perfectly!” – Emilio

 

Always There, Always Ready…Go Ahead, Pry.Me

story:
Last year we introduced BULLET: World's Smallest LED Flashlight. We are back again, now with an even more minimal design, inspired by the iconic 40 S&W round. 

Introducing BULLET 02: World's Smallest LED Flashlight, Even Smaller.

 

We wanted to create something better and solve all the issues that the first Bullet faced. So we went back to the drawing board and started a complete redesign. 

The uber minimal design makes it even smaller than it's counterpart. BULLET 02 can be attached to virtually anything. Your gym bag, your jacket, your keys. Suitable for any indoor or outdoor situation.

 

 

We believe that your everyday carry essentials are a reflection of you and your lifestyle. BULLET 02 not only is functional, beautiful and minimal, but its new design makes it the best, most resistant everyday carry tiny LED flashlight available.

BULLET 02 will feature a quick 180 degree rotation that is spring locked for secure on/off operation. The Bullet 02 will not unlatch even under the most vigorous conditions. 

 

Pushing the boundaries was our goal- How can we make BULLET better? Waterproof. More minimal. More secure. Smaller. Brighter. And most important of all, indestructible.

 

 

 

 

We designed Bullet 02 with resistance in mind. We wanted to create a flashlight so durable, it will last in any condition and under any circumstances. We even ran over it with an SUV.

 

Designed with aerospace-grade aluminum and a sleek anodized treatment, BULLET 02 is built for any situation possible. 

Rain, sleet, hail, snow, heat and most importantly of all, water. Meaning BULLET 02 can be submerged underwater for a total of 5 minutes without any water breaching it's seals. It will illuminate in any weather and in any situation, helping you solve any problem.

Our first design wasn't enough. We came up with an even smaller design, added a spring lock mechanism to increase pressure inside of the casing. We also added a longer stem with fine threading to avoid BULLET 02 from unlatching. We combined that with premium aircraft grade aluminum alloy for a refined finish. 

Measuring in at an incredible 10mm x 26mm and weighing only 5 grams, BULLET 02 is the perfect sized flashlight for modern day wear. Powered by three LR41 Button Cell batteries to produce 20 lumens of light, keep it with you at all times, anywhere you go. 

What makes us different? We eliminate the bulk, weight, and hassle from traditional everyday carry flashlights, creating a seamless experience for you every single day.

 

 

One of the main features we wanted to redesign was our previous "Twist Operation". We have improved this by creating a new mechanism altogether. This time, improving the threading by making it finer and having the threading extend all the way up through the inner casing. In addition, adding a gold plated spring inside for optimal conductivity and pressure, for keeping Bullet 02 snug and sturdy at all times.

We wanted to keep the minimal design without unnecessary buttons to keep it slick. With the new spring lock operation, it won't ever open unintentionally.

An LED light is ideal for everyday use over a long period of time. Never worry about breaking the light, since no glass or filament is used, or replacing it, since LEDs can last a lifetime. These batteries also last much longer with LED light, saving you both time and money in the long haul.

 

What is an LED you ask? LED’s are the most efficient kind of light bulbs out on the market today. One small bulb can last you anywhere from 20,000 to 100,000 hours. Of course you'll still have to replace the batteries periodically. However, we decided to use a premium bulb for BULLET 02 that can last up to 150,000 hours in lifespan.

 

This time we made the threads tighter, finer, and added a rubber O-ring inside the casing to create a more secure and waterproof flashlight. Also, the leverage provided by the key ring makes it easy to twist on/off. Furthermore, the triangle ring offers increased stability when on a keychain.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Weight: 5 Grams
  • Width: 10.5 mm
  • Length: 26 mm
  • Materials: Premium Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy (T6061)
  • Battery: LR41 Button Cell
  • Type of bulb: LED 5mm
  • Special Features: Premium On/Off twist setting, and Mini Key Ring attached.
  • Color Options: Brass and Black

 

SLUGHAUS is a small company based out of San Francisco with the sole mission of helping you stay minimal and functional. We believe that your everyday carry essentials influence your lifestyle. BULLET 02's elegance inspires innovation, while its functionality keeps you on-the-go. We hope that our products not only help keep you minimal, but help mold your lifestyle as a whole.

Hi-Res Gallery: Here

story:
Ship to 2000 + Backers in 69 Countries in Jan 2020!

Mu Tag: The Easiest Way To Never Lose Your Stuff Again

 

While you want to keep track of your belongings, you don't necessarily want a bulky tracker stuck to everything. Mu Tag is the perfect compromise. Other systems only help once your belongings are lost, but the Mu tag will keep you from losing them in the first place!

 

  

Attach Mu tag to absolutely any personal item: bags, wallet, passport, cameras, car, credit cards, keys, bikes, laptop, notebooks, and more!

  • THE SMALLEST TRACKER - Mu Tag is designed to be extremely compact and go unnoticed anywhere you place it.
  • REAL TIME ALERTS - Receive instant notifications on your smartphone or smartwatch before you leave your belongings behind.
  • LIFE AS LONG AS YOUR ITEMS - Mu Tag is the only compact tracking device with a rechargeable battery and reusable adhesive backing, so you never have to replace it.
  • MACHINE LEARNING - Our system uses AI and Google API integration to determine safe locations and to deliver smart notifications only when needed.

 

Hear What Others Have To Say

 

 

Intuitive App for iOS & Android

Our app helps you manage notifications and leash lengths for multiple Mu Tags at once, even when you are out of cellular coverage. 
iOS App Download Link

 

 

We value our items not only for their inherent value (that laptop wasn't cheap!) but also for their invaluable personal worth. We understand the pain of losing a camera not only for the device, but for the photos and memories that are lost with them. That's why our team created Mu Tag, as the easiest, smartest tracking device for anything.

 

Smart Notifications

Our app configures and optimizes notifications for each Mu Tag with the help of software learning.

 

The whole purpose of Mu tag is to keep track of your things, and our software learning tech means that you no longer have to make that a conscious effort. Although users can manually set safe locations and notification distances for their Mu tags, the best part about the Mu tag is that you don't have to! With the use of AI, our app will learn what areas (home, office, etc.) are safe, and will avoid sending unnecessary notifications in these areas. Similarly, the app will use map data and other inputs to determine when users are in an area the requires immediate notifications. This means that you won't be bothered by an alert when leaving your laptop at home, but you will know the instant your wallet is left behind at a restaurant. 
 

Don't Replace. Recharge.

The Mu tag is the only personal tracking solution that always you to recharge the device. This means years of prolonged use without ever having to replace your tags.

 

 

 

 

​

story:
Open doors while out and about.
 

Press buttons on keypads, elevators, ATMs and more.

Eradicates 99.9% of contacted germ species through Oligodynamic effect within 4 hours.

 

No More Touching Door Handles

Germs are on the rise. Whether it's recent outbreaks or interactions with common surfaces used thousands of times a day, we need new ways to keep ourselves and our loved ones safe.

That's why we developed Sanitas, the world's thinnest antimicrobial copper door opener that fits effortlessly in your wallet or keychain.

With hundreds of studies published on copper's inherent antimicrobial properties, Sanitas allows you to open doors, press buttons, pay for gas, and use ATMs safely.

You don't need to carry sparsely found hand sanitizer, wipes, or use your coat sleeve anymore - Sanitas is an eco-friendly, sustainable alternative.

And $1 from every unit sold goes towards helping those in need in these unprecedented times.

 

Thin & Durable

 

Unlike similar door opener EDC products, Sanitas is thin and made out of self-sterilizing copper alloy. You can carry it on a keychain, or keep it stored safely in your wallet where it will not make contact with any of your other belongings or skin for maximum protection from germs.

 

Self-Sterilizing Copper Alloy

 

Sanitas is made from an oligodynamic metal - inactivating common germs, spores, and viral species within 4 hours. In 2015, an additional study found that if hospitals replace touch surfaces with copper, they reduce patient infection rates by over 58%[1]. This is a drastic decrease in transmission rate, and is one of the reasons why hospitals are thinking of employing copper surfaces nationwide.

 

Affordability

 

Just because the Sanitas is made out of a solid copper alloy - doesn't mean we want it to weigh down your wallet. That's why we've developed a design that is both elegant and durable yet incredibly consistent to produce on a mass scale - to be able to create a sanitary way of interacting with the world around you that everybody can affordably access.

 

$1 from each unit goes to charity

 

We believe in giving back to our local communities as often as possible. $1 from every unit of Sanitas is distributed to an independently governed non-profit organization that works with charities, food banks, shelters, and medical supply distributors to best assist in these changing times. We aim to be as transparent as possible - all backers and followers of our journey will be updated with the organizations and initiatives we actively support.

 

The Story

Every idea starts with a problem and ours was simple.

How do you engage with the world on an everyday-basis while mitigating the risk of exposure to germs without compromising functionality (And your glove, sweater, etc)? 

This question is what inspired us to create SANITAS, a simple solution to an everyday predicament.

My name is Noah, and I am one of the co-founders of SANITAS.

A few years ago I was studying metal fabrication and always had a curiosity in creating functional tools (Eco-friendly log presses, reusable metal scribes, etc) before starting Jolt Arc Lighters, a company that creates practical eco-friendly pocket lighters.

 

The experience of putting something out into the world that creates a positive measurable impact has been hard work but is extremely rewarding; improving an existing technology that will contribute to humanity until the point that someone else inevitably improves upon that.

This has brought me to SANITAS, which my co-founders and I have worked hard to develop in an extremely short period of time to hopefully contribute value to the world and keep people healthy.

 

With your contribution on Indiegogo, we're looking to scale up production of the SANITAS to keep it affordable for everyone while also supporting charitable causes. We've been honored by the feedback we've already received about the device and we can't wait to get it into more hands as soon as possible!

What We Need & What You Get

 

We're looking to raise $3,000 USD to reach our goal. Although we are a proudly Canadian-based company, we realize a plurality of our audience will come from the United States, and are looking to have most of our units distributed from an American based warehouse so that they can arrive as quickly as possible to backers.

COVID-19 Disclaimer

A disclaimer: this product page does not make the medical claim that Sanitas cures, prevents, or treats COVID-19.

A wealth of research shows that copper and tin significantly reduce microbial lifespans and efficacy.

Our tool doesn't prevent or cure COVID-19 - we're simply suggesting that Sanitas, through distancing from common public surfaces helps you avoid direct contact with areas where pathogens are known to exist (like door handles, ATMs, and so on).

Please also don't take Sanitas as an encouragement to stop important, infection-reducing practices like frequent handwashing, social distancing, and not touching your face. The best way to fight the spread of a disease has and always will be personal hygiene.

Risks & Challenges

Developing a product during a crisis is never an easy task. Luckily, we've already sourced and have amassed starter quantities of inventory to fulfill orders as soon as June and July 2020, with more to come as the campaign reaches its goals.

Although many cities still have a work-at-home order, we believe by the time our fulfillment timeline rolls around, we'll be able to safely and securely send packages worldwide from our warehouse.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed

Our Vancouver-based team ships worldwide. If your order is lost in transit and/or if the unit is deformed from production, let us know and we'll fix it immediately and send you a new one.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Feel free to use the buttons up above to share via Facebook, Email or Instagram! No amount of support is too big or too small - even a quick mention to a friend or family member you think could use the SANITAS we're extremely grateful for!

Thanks so much for taking a look at our campaign - we can't wait to get this product in your hands right away.

No amount of support is too big or too small - even a quick mention to a friend or family member you think could use the SANITAS we're extremely grateful for!Thanks so much for taking a look at our campaign - we can't wait to get this product in your hands right away.

story:
The Story of Rwanda Enduro 

Hi there! My name is Moses King, I lived in Rwanda for 15 years, and my last year there I started a mountain bike race. This race is a 3 day race where riders ride the hills of Rwanda. I raced my first mountain bike race at age 12 with the Africa Rising Cycling Center. I was excited to compete in another race, but no one organized another one. So, I decided to do it myself. The process was long and much harder than I thought to balance school and organize a bike race for the first time. I managed to make it happen in May 2019, and I have been planning to make the Rwanda Enduro an annual event. For the event March 12-14, 2021, I look forward to a successful event. (Take a listen to https://player.fm/series/mtb-tribe-your-trail-m... look at rwandaenduro.com). This race is important to me because I would like to see mountain biking thrive in Rwanda and keep creating new opportunities for people in the communities we work with to improve their trails while putting on show. Helping me will;

-Enable me to hire more local people to come out and work on their own footpaths in the hills,

-Bring people to see the beauty of Rwanda

-Make it enjoyable for every rider that comes to ride the land of a thousand hills.

What we need & What you get 

For this campaign and my dreams of making Rwanda Enduro successful and impactful for a second edition, I aim to raise 10,00 dollars. Your generous funding will go towards the start up cost of the event which includes travel to Rwanda, mean of transportation, lodging, food, marketing, and trail building which is done by local Rwandans (alongside trail experts that have volunteered to help from South Africa and Canada). 

Our perks to supporters:

 

 You will get some Rwanda Enduro swag (t shirts, hats, stickers, etc.) and have a trail named after you or an organization you'd like to promote. If I don't reach the campaign goal the funds will still forsure go towards trails maintenance, and my trip to Rwanda to make this race happen.  

The Impact

This project is an impact not only to the mountain biking community, but to Rwanda and East Africa. I am working on getting Rwanda Enduro listed as a qualifier for the Enduro World Series (EWS). This will bring more people who love nature and the outdoors to mountain bike in Rwanda, and will of course make Rwandans lives' who work with us much better with the employment I will be continuing to provide. 

The last Rwanda Enduro race brought 15 racers from 12 different nationalities and created a new trails network in Rwanda. With your help we will be bring many smiles to the kids who will love the excitement, to the adults who will finally find work, and to the community of mountain bikers. Since I Rwanda Enduro established others have tried to re make the event. New mountain bike events have risen around Rwanda. I am happy this was a direct impact from Rwanda Enduro.  

Risks and Challenges

While I was working on the race for 2019 and 2020, I faced financial obstacles, unexpected delays in paper work, and not having enough helpers. Of course with Covid 19 in 2020 I had to cancel the event. I am ensuring that I will do everything within my control that this will not be the same for 2021. I would like you all the donors to know what their money does and the risks involved. With the experience I have had the past two years, I am now more prepared to go back and have a smooth set up for 2021 and the years to follow. I have reached out to many other organizers for any advice or tips to make this event happen as evenly possible. I am committed and have the support structure ready to face them!

Other Ways You Can Help 

Tell as many people as possible about the campaign! You can use the Indiegogo share tools to easily do this! Share on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, e-mail, or any other way you can think of!

story:
A bold backpack

Questions? Comments? Check the FAQ page or ask us: sales@andeanblue.com

Shipping November 2020

 

Andean Accents merge culture and modern life. Our daypack allows you to make a bold statement and adventure simultaneously. Unique accents - Unique memories.

A place for everything

On top of being functional, beautifully bold and unique, the rich colors of the Andean textiles make it easier to spot you if you get lost in the forest or the snow. 

Other features include:

- An internal pocket for your hydration system (water bladder) with a hole for the hose.

- A front pocket for your keys, wallet, etc.

- A whistle on the buckle of the chest, 

- A low front pocket for easy access to snacks, power bars, etc.

- A stash pocket on each side. These pockets fit most water bottles.

- Compression straps to make sure the weight is balanced.

- An external frame that keeps the backpack off your back, allowing it to breathe and placing the weight on your shoulders and waist.

- The frame is removable!

- Small pockets on each side of the waist strap.

 

- A hidden lower pocket with a rain cover! The backpack is water resistant but we want to make sure your belongings stay dry.

The prototype

This 20L backpack is very sturdy and can be used in a variety of situations. You can use it for day hikes (It has a pocket for your hydration system), when traveling or even just day-to-day. And it is not only of great quality, it is enhanced with Andean textiles, which are colorful, bold, and resilient — representative of the Andean culture.

The backpack that we are featuring is the original prototype. The final product will have our logo and will look more like this:

With three options for the accents:

 

Trendy without trying

Made for the outdoorsy, the explorers, the trailblazers. Made for you. Because you are so used to have other people follow in your footsteps...

 

It's personal

Growing up in Peru, I have always found Andean culture fascinating: Adapting and surviving in the midst of challenges. These expressions appeared everywhere in small accessories, textiles, jacket patches or completely unique products like the intricate design on chocolate bar packaging - descriptively Andean and handmade.

We want to bring this rich Andean life, culture and history to the forefront of hiking and outdoor activities with our textile accents.

 

Andean Blue

One of the questions we are asked often is about our logo. In the Andean cosmovision, the universe is mostly divided in three realms (named in Quechua here, for simplicity): The Hananpacha or sky/heaven, represented by the Kuntur (condor), the Kaypacha or earth/ground, represented by the Atuq (fox) and the Hurinpacha or underground, represented by the Amaru or machukuay (serpent). Since we consider ourselves explorers of the outdoors, we felt identified with the wandering Atuq (fox).

The style of our logo was inspired by the iconography of different Andean cultures.

 

 

The campaign

We are preselling our first batch of 500 backpacks as a way to launch Andean Blue. The backpacks are not only very high quality and practical, but they stand out (in a great way). You’ll always know which backpack is yours and, since you can’t buy them anywhere else, people will always be asking you “Where did you get that backpack? It’s so unique”. 

Ready to try one out? Buy one now and support us. Through these backpacks, we’re helping keep Andean culture alive in a unique and accessible way. Whether you’re an avid hiker or a newbie, or just want something more stylish, our backpacks are for you. 

Interested but not your thing?

You can always help us by sharing this campaign and telling your friends, coworkers and random strangers about us!

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

story:
Freddy was born from a simple problem, a broke student with a lot of knowledge about his city, the desire to share it, but the obstacles to become a guide. 

Freddy is built for the smart traveller, and for the new generation of guides. A platform to share and gain knowledge cross borders.

 

Application Features:

Free AR City Map 

Free AR landmark information. Gives traveller direct access to information about popular landmarks. Walk on the street, point your phone to the landmark, and there it is, beautifully displayed:

  • information,
  • video,
  • images,
  • stories about that landmark. ALL FOR FREE!

 

Tour Creating Platform  

Anybody with knowledge about a certain place can become a guide. They can create a tour from the comfort of their home. It's as simple as that. 

 

Tour Booking Platform 

Tell us what you like!

Based on the information you provide us we will serve you tours of the things you love most. Going from Sport tours, kids tours to pup crawls (which include coupons for free drinks!). All in the city you are right now, to the city you'll be in days, weeks or months!

Select your favourite tour.

Chat with the guide.

Ask for recommendations.

Activate it once your GPS location is at the starting point of the tour. 

 

Free to tour whenever you like, there are no time restrictions. You book it, and then you decide when to activate it. So no more difficult decisions or bad moods whilst going on a tour! We'll tell you whether it's going to rain or it's going to be to hot. But you are free to follow our advice or not, you are the only one in charge of when you go on your tour. 

No more going on tours with complete strangers. Although it might look like a good opportunity to meet new people it mostly isn't. If you still feel like touring with others we at Freddy will make sure you like them. By finding people with similar interests, tour history and preferences. You can chat with them in advance, decide to buddy up and share an amazing experience together. Make friends EVERYWHERE IN THE WORLD!

 

 

 

Social Travel Network 

A place to share pictures and thoughts of the tours you’ve taken, and get inspired by fellow travellers and guides to take new ones! Freddy is the One Stop Shop for tours. 

 

 

What We Need

We are now ready to launch! But in order to be able to deliver quality we need €50,000.

We'll use them to expand our staff and customer service so that we can deliver a top notch experience from start to end to all our guides and all our travellers. 

If we don't reach our goal of €50,000 we will still try to get as far as we can with what we'll get. We've raised a round through friends and family and we have bootstrapped. We know how to make a lot with a little.

What You'll Get

Pro Backers (€1000+): 1 year using Freddy for free, as a Guide AND as a traveller. This means, going on as many tours you like all around the world. PLUS! Whenever we launch in a new city after this year, you'll get a tour budget of €100 for that city! This is a lifetime guarantee. ON TOP OF THIS: When Freddy reaches it's first 1.000.000 paying customers you'll be invited to the Freddy HQ in London. This includes: A flight towards our HQ from your home city, a 2 night's stay in a 5star accommodation and of course a perfectly organised Freddy day full of freedom and new discoveries.

Backers (€500): 1 year using Freddy for free, as a Guide AND as a traveller. This means, going on as many tours you like all around the world. PLUS! Whenever we launch in a new city after this year, you'll get a tour budget of €100 for that city! This is a lifetime guarantee.

Supporters (€250): A tour budget of €500 that you can spend wherever you want to. And at the moment of our Official launch we'll send you an official Freddy merchandising package!

 

The Impact

Freddy has the potential to revolutionise an entire industry and to allow people to travel and discover the world, through real, trustworthy and useful information, in the forms of images, text, audios and videos.

  • At the moment there are about 0,001 tours available for each of the millions of travellers in the world. There is not enough choice for travellers.

  • Aspiring tour-guides need a platform that will allow them to shine with what they know, and make more people as knowledgeable as they are.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If  you can't contribute but you love the idea, share it around! and help us build the Uber of the Travel Tour industry!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about Freddy!

  •  Use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

If you have any questions, send us an email at founders@readyfreddy.co.uk and we'll add it to the FAQ.

story:
Gnarlcraft- 

My name is Jacob Stiller and my Company is Gnarlcraft Board Co.  We are a small company that is under a year out.  We build beautiful pieces of art that also preserve a form and function. Our boards are built from locally sourced materials that are in majority upcycled.  Our focus is to influence the local community to have passion for outdoor board sports and to build a stronger connection with the outdoors. We want to grow and help others grow while perpetuating passion for doing the things we love.  Our campaign is to raise money to help our company grow so we can get snowboards and longboards from our local community into more individuals hands! We want everyone to have a beautiful piece of art that they can use when going out and adventuring. We are hoping to raise enough money to get a pneumatic press in order to speed up our building process being all of our boards are hand built. This also will increase the quality of your boards and allow us to grow in skill with the building process.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $4000 in order to invest into a pneumatic press for our company. This money will directly impact our local community in a couple of ways. This will allow us to continue producing boards of the highest quality but also will be able to do it in a more timely fashion. That being said, we can produce more boards and with the overstock we can then start to donate longboards and snowboards to local community member to build the sport. We want to build our community by giving back.  Our end goal is to spread the love by driving passion and getting everyone excited about what they are passionate about.
  • If we raise our entire goal we will be hosting a few events and will be giving away prizes at the events that will range from goggles, hats and sherpa hoodies to a custom snowboard. If we raise more than our goal we will be starting a shop space/learning space where we will be hosting classes on how to build your own board!

The Impact

• Our local snow and skate community has been shrinking over the years. With the influence of a local company we hope to build this community back up and build the passion of creating beautiful things with our hands.  Board building is a long lost art that can be every rider knowledge.  These sports are fun sports that everyone can do and can connect individuals with the nature that surrounds them!

Risks & Challenges

  • There are always financial risks with starting a company but we how our dedication and passion for this will drive us far beyond. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please spread the word and use Indiegog tools.
  • Also at any chance, bring a friend with you when you go out boarding. Any potential new community member only builds and the only way to build is to inspire those around you!

story:
OUR MISSION

Thousands of flights are delayed or cancelled due to weather in the United States every year. Headquartered in North Carolina, our team of seasoned travel experts aims to provide a better travel experience for passengers on a national scale.

WHAT WE WILL PROVIDE

PHASE I (Website Soft Launch)

  • Real-Time Flight Tracking and Weather
  • Live Agent Assist Hotel Booking

PHASE II (More Functionalities & App Launch)

  • Flight Rebooking Services
  • Concierge Packages
  • GateFrog iOS and Android Apps

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

Our goal is to raise $5,000 to help advance our concept into the next stages as we grow!

Can you help? As a thank you, you will get early access to the app and amazing thank you gifts- special passes/access from companies that we are in the process of signing on as vendors in airports and other great things, check out the perks section!

story:
After enduring weeks of heavy rains, Myanmar absorbed another heavy blow at the end of July, when a cyclone in the Bay of Bengal came ashore, bringing new damage and flooding.  The flooding has submerged massive areas of the country, affecting residents in 11 of Myanmar’s 14 states and divisions.  The heaviest affected areas are among the poorest states in Myanmar, a country where nearly 70 percent of people live close to the $2/day poverty threshold, and children make up 34 percent of the population.

Flash floods and landslides caused by unusually heavy monsoon rains have claimed at least 69 lives and affected some 260,000 people so far, and these numbers are expected to rise, as officials warned that swollen rivers were threatening new areas.

In addition to the human cost, there has been extensive damage to housing and farmland; and infrastructure has been badly hit, with roads and rail lines cut in many areas and telecommunication links broken. The flooding has inundated more than 1 million acres of farmland, with 520,000 more acres reportedly damaged.

Myanmar's government has admitted its "weak" initial response has hampered evacuation efforts, and is appealing to for international assistance to help provide food, temporary shelter and clothing.

What Is Needed

There is a desperate and immediate need for food, temporary shelters, clothing, clean water, and the means to deliver them to the affected populations.  My plan is to take whatever donations that are made from this campaign and transfer them to aid agencies already working in the field so they can continue their efforts while while international relief efforts ramp up.  Each day that passes places more people at risk for their very lives.

Impact

In a country where nearly 70 percent of people live close to the $2/day poverty threshold, even a $5 donation will have a tremendous impact. You will be helping the citizens of Myanmar to help themselves.  Most of the aid workers in the field are Myanmar nationals; these affected areas are where their families and neighbors live.  They will be using your donations efficiently and effectively to bring supplies where they are most needed.  Whether by boat, ox-cart or on foot, the supplies your donations buy WILL get to the people that need them. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If a cash donation isn't possible, could you please take a moment and share this on your Facebook page or other social media?  Getting the word out to as many people as possible will be a powerful contribution.  And don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Naomi who is aged only 14 is currently raising money for T.S Echo which is Llanelli Sea Cadets Unit. Can you help by donating?

T.S. Echo does fantastic work with in our community. They help young children from the ages 10-18 showing them how life is in the Forces but mainly the Royal Navy. Staff at T.S. Echo has taken on many children with additional needs, to help them personally develop. Naomi's twin brother has autism and he also attends the Sea Cadets with Naomi.

Naomi has been a committed cadet for the past three and a half years, and loves being there. Sea cadets have given her the confidence to do many great things. Since she has been in sea cadets she has achieved a lot. Over the past two years Naomi has raised over £2300 for the Royal British Legion she was nominated for the young volunteer of Carmarthenshire award, which she then won. She would now like to help raise money for the unit itself. The unit has to raise all its own funds, so Naomi is hoping that she can help by doing a sponsored tandem bike ride with her brother Joe, who is training to be a Royal Marine. On the 15th of August they plan to cycle 20 miles along the coastal path. Please sponsor them so they can help this very worthwhile cause.

Their target is to raise over £1000 for T.S. Echo.

Please Donate!!!

story:
BASICS OF OUR PROJECT

Our product is a PATCH (see below) that every travelers need to stick on their backpacks. It's valid 3 years and with that, you get 10% off your whole stay in each of our partners hostels and a free refreshing drink on arrival. 


WHAT WE WANT TO ACHIEVE

Let's be honest, it's annoying, painful and a total waste of time looking for THE hostels in the city you want to visit. You are leaving for an adventure and you don't want to lose precious time on a computer in a weird looking bar. That's where Patch Your Trip come to help. We are on a mission to pick only ONE hostel per city and cover the whole WORLD. Why only one hostel? It's pretty simple, because it's THE best. The only thing you need it's your PATCH and a great mindset that you are going to have a GREAT and AWESOME trip. Oh we almost forgot, now that you are a certified "PATCHER" and that you are putting some mileage onto that patch, we are offering some gifts ;) 


TIMELINE


1. Every hostel that is part of the Patch Your Trip movement are giving a free refreshing drink on arrival. This simple drink is what you need after a looooong day traveling. *Note that we also have hostels in Costa-Rica and Hawaï that provide free surf rental on replacement of the drink, not bad Eh!  

2. Our partner hostels are also giving you 10% off your whole stay. That's great because you don't have to ask for it, just show your PATCH and that discount is available :) 

Currently connecting 140 hostels in 44 countries.  Visit our websitefor more information of each hostels: http://patchyourtrip.com/

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We need you to be a part of this incredible experience. This way we'll be able to gain visibility and offer you better services. This includes better platform, awesome packaging and the ability to bring this project in 2nd gear. We got a bunch of ideas to create a unique community, let's make it happen together. Thank you! 

HOW ARE WE HELPING HOSTELS

That's great because we are killing two birds with one stone. We are helping travelers find their way with benefits and now let me explain you how we are helping every hostels.

2. We are doing a free advertising of every hostel directly on our website. What facilities they got, what they are offering, etc... 

3. Since that every customer needs to book directly on our platform or on the hostel website, it's much more rewarding for them. 


WHAT WILL THE TANK TOP LOOK LIKE?


WANT TO HELP WITHOUT BUYING

We know that this project is mainly for travelers and if in any mean you want to help us in this great adventure you can like/share our facebook page or start spreading the word. Your friends travel a lot? Tell them that we exist and that we can help them to travel more, for less. We would be infinitely grateful for such help thank you. 


SPECIAL THANKS

Special thanks to Limonade© and Cambium© for the incredible job they did on creating our video.

story:
What is CityScout?


We all love to travel. We all hate feeling like tourists. We want to be explorers... the travelers who experience destinations like the locals that live there. 


CityScout is building an app that helps you do just that. Our Founders have traveled to over 30 countries in the last few years. We found a lot of pain points when looking for things to do in new places, and we really feel it shouldn't have to be that difficult. Sometimes you just need a safe, reliable, local friend to help you navigate and do amazing things... without ever having to feel like you are compromising your adventure. 

CityScout enables you connect with locals based on things you are looking to do, and do it with them. No one wants to see the same old tourist traps. Instead we want to see the "road less traveled." No more tours. No more tourist traps. No more fighting off selfie sticks! With CityScout you get the best locals that do awesome things you are interested in, and want to make you a part of them.

We are creating an app to create a global community of like-minded travel adventurers. Help us create this platform and make the dream of having unlimited connections between people all around the world a reality!



1. CityScout allows you to customize your adventure details, and is the only platform to let you name your price!


2. CityScout uses a custom search engine to put you in touch with the locals that fit your exact adventure. We filter your details and key words in your adventure description to match you with locals that have exact matches on their profiles. You will only search through Scouts that fit exactly what you are looking for. 


3. Do cool stuff with locals who do the things you described regularly in their city because its their passion too. 



Giving Travelers What They Want



What People Are Using CityScout For? 


The Safety of Users is our priority!


What We Are Building...

We are raising funds to finish the build of our app. We have had great success with testing our web platform, but have found that over 70% of our web traffic comes from mobile. 

Travelers all over the world want to help make our mission a reality, but without a an app we will struggle to meet our demand.
Funds will go to hiring a developer for the project, UX/UI design, and bug fixes to bring you the best app out there. 

Help us to build a community that creates the best experiences anywhere you go. 


What We Have Done And Where We Are Going...


Doing Our Homework

We have done months worth of research and testing in a sincere effort to minimize our risk.

  • Interviews with travelers and tourists coming to LA
  • Extensive A/B testing to hone in on a core message that resonates with fellow travel adventure seekers
  • Randomized surveys for primary data
  • Consumer input on real CityScout activities

Other Ways You Can Help:

Share our Cause! If you can't swing a donation right now, share the campaign and help your friends win a free flight! 

And, share it for the founding team and our blue eyed mascot. We are so grateful for all the help and support we can grab.


We appreciate YOU! Travel On! 


*Flight valued at maximum $500 in the form of a flight voucher to the airline of your choosing.

story:
Mongol what?

Would you rather work in a humid office mid-July? Spend your day seeking unavailable spots on a Mediterranean beach? Or look for the remaining unpaved roads within the Stan region, driving an old crappy car, and for a good cause? Well, as far as we re concerned, we went with option 3 and decided to embark on this insane/crazy/scary, however you want to call it, adventure. 


We will be driving from Prague all the way to Ulan Ude, Siberia, crossing the borders of most Stan countries, Iran, Mongolia and Russia while teasing both Afghanistan's and Syria's borders. That implies crossing deserts, mountain chains, passing by historical soviet sites, temples and markets recalling the greatness of the silk road. But we do not want to keep that for ourselves.

You too will be able to follow and share those moments with us thanks to our onboard cameras, blogs and many other surprises.. This will hopefully help us justify the irrationality of our adventure if we can't put it up into words right now. And its quite simple: Hoping to make our life more entertaining and make the world a better place! But before we elaborate on that here is a short description of our team:

 The Team

  • 4 guys 
  • From Switzerland although living between London and Montreal
  • Trying to stay in touch and organise that rally through short Skypes that get us even more confused
  • However, most importantly, we're just a bunch of passionated yet maybe temerarious travellers willing to reach new horizons by using our past experiences to help us overcome our undeniable lack of technical capabilities to handle cars.

Lucas                          Mana                        Elliott                             Vlad

 Lucas : 

+ Our men meant to entertain us during those long and difficult hours jammed in the traffic of Tehran.           

- Will however force us to drive extra hours as we do NOT trust him behind a car wheel.                                                                                              

Mana: 

+ His communication skills will probably help us save a lot of money on bribing           

- Will worsen our already though nights of sleep due to his pathological snoring                                                                                                                                        

Elliott: 

+ He's certainly mandated by a Chinese intelligence agency to keep an eye on us, we nonetheless love listening to his stories about the places we will visit                        

 - Will probably break everything we will ask him to hold                                                                        

Vlad: 

+ He will remind us to avoid staying too long on the Turkish coast in July as this may be a two months long party trap                                                                                  

- Will probably let us die starving if we do not keep our food storage's location secret

We need you to have a greater impact

  •  As we said earlier, we want to help the world and will achieve doing so under two different ways: Fund a reforestation program in the Amazon with a NGO, named CoolEarth, likewise seeking to reinsert displaced tribes and develop local economies.
  • Additionally, we will help financially a Geneva-based NGO, LetItBeat, which aims to provide training to foreign doctors to undertake heart operations for children that fled unstable areas within the Middle-Eastern region.
  • Considering the situation in Nepal, we have decided to donate one third of raised funds to P.I.E.C.E.S.

    P.I.E.C.E.S is an entirely student run organisation of the University of St Gallen working in the field of education in less privileged areas of this world. They have projects in Asia and South and Central America in partnership with public schools and send their highly qualified volunteer teams to teach there for a longer period of time twice a year. 


        

                   

                      


15'000 USD is our goal
By helping us to raise such an exceptional amount of money, you would help us reinforce local communities in South America as well as provide unique medical cares to kids living in ongoing tougher living conditions.  If you want further details on how we will/can help them, go on their websites. We will provide you all the additional information along the way!


Would you fancy helping us?

As you may know, this adventure will end up costing us an arm and we would really appreciate your help. No matter how big or small your contribution might be, we would be incredibly grateful. So in the case you feel like sponsoring us and the charities, great perks are awaiting for you!

Important points to note:

  • 50% of every dollar you decide to give will go straight to the charities while the remaining part to the funding of our trip
  • Follow our blog, Facebook page or website to get the latest update on our trip and get to hear priceless local stories
  • If you know anything that we could do along our way or just feel the need of seeing us dancing ridiculously in the Mongol Steppes please let us know! We will be glad to accomplish them after a ten hours drive. At this stage, our brain may lead us to realize the unthinkable so get creative! 

Team Website: www.swisstravelcaravan.com

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Swiss-Travel-Caravan/908353702531838

  • And again, please share the word for us with your friends and family because thats the key! THANK YOU!

!!THANK YOU!!

Important points to note:


50% of every dollar you decide to give will go straight to the charities while the remaining part to the funding of our trip

And again, please share the word for us with your friends and family because thats the key! THANK YOU!




!!THANK YOU!!

story:
Credentials

We have been in underwater wireless communications for more than seventeen years. We are global leaders in reliable underwater wireless communication. Our technology has been proven and utilized successfully in many sub-sea industries such as sub-sea oil and gas that demands high reliability and durability.  We come with unparalleled credentials to bring you a ground breaking and innovative product for Scuba and other diving pursuits.  Now we are miniaturizing this technology for the scuba diver. For more information about us see www.mydiveline.com and www.dspcomm.com

Testimonials for our core acoustic communication technology

Claude Cazaoulou, Acoustic Domain Manager, Thales Safare - France:

"Upon completing this evaluation, we found DSPComm's AquaComm modem was the only one to meet all our selection criteria. Most key to this decision for us was we could ensure we maintained our credibility and reputation with our customers for reliable, quality products. We have found DSPComm's Aquacomm product range to be more than capable in this regard"

 

Tim Waldby, Enviromental Systems Manager, MetOcean Engineers, Perth, Australia

"We concluded that DSPComm's Aquacomm modems fulfill our requirements of high underwater communications reliability, low power consumption and simple integration. We are now formalizing our integration plans and will commence manufacture and deployments over the coming months so that underwater wireless communications capability with our instruments are available off the shelf."

Read the full testimonials at:

http://www.dspcomm.com/company_testimonials.html

 

Changing Scuba for the better

Scuba diving is fascinating yet an extreme sport. You are drawn into a rich and beautiful experience in another world but there are many risks and hazards lurking. Situations can get out of hand very quickly and divers can get trapped, getting injured and sometimes ending up in a fatality.

Diveline will create an underwater wireless (using sound) network where divers can send messages to each other and the surface. Diveline will have a navigation function where you can locate (distance and direction) your separated dive buddy, the boat or a lost diver. The distance for both communication (field tested) and navigation is 2km. Find your way and stay connected with Diveline.

Demo of DiveLine sending messages

Features

  • Two way messaging : Send preset messages between yourself, your buddies as well as the boat. These messages can be customized to the dive either using a wifi app from your smart device or via the user screen. Additionally a message can by entered via the keyboard and transmitted.
  • Wireless communication range up to 2km (tested to 2.5km). The communications works in shallow water (1m) as well as deep water. Works in highly reflective environments such as harbors or caves.
  • Communication set up in an underwater acoustic wifi  network. Add any number of divers. We have developed and tested an underwater ad-hoc mesh network that is fast and reliable.
  • Navigation: Find the boat or your lost buddy or locate a diver in distress. Mark a wreck. Many possible applications to mark and navigate underwater.
  • Emergency alert activation so other divers or the boat can find you quickly
  • Wireless Charging : No penetrating and unreliable connectors. 16+ hours of operation before re-charge (tested).
  • Wi-Fi enabled: To set up and configure DiveLine with a smart phone app (Android and IOS), down load data as well as update firmware.
  • Digital Compass incorporated with the navigation function
  • Intuitive menus to quickly navigate received messages, transmit messages, Navigation view, Air pressure view.
  • OLED color display for clear readability even at night.
  • Size 11cm long x 7.6cm wide x 3cm height. Can be strapped on forearm or stowed in the BCD  or elsewhere.

See below for explanation of the perks

Why are we crowd funding?

The main reason for this campaign is to raise sufficient funds to complete the prototype within four months, ready for testing by scuba divers. The second important reason is to get the community involved with the development of this product. As this is a personal device the community is an important contributor to the final form of the product. We want to put a product into the hands of Scuba divers that they helped shape and create from an early stage of the development.

How will we utilize the funds

We will use the funds to finish the prototype. Currently we have completed approximately 80% of the prototype. We are at the stage of integrating and testing all the parts that make up the system. This includes firmware, hardware as well as completing the injection molds for pressure casing.

The other areas that we will apply the funds are setting up a customer support team, packaging, marketing material, type approval certification.

Our challenges

While we are confident that the core technology will work we have still got a lot of testing and validation to carry out with real divers. The next biggest challenge is setting up marketing and support networks globally.

Make diving safer

Diveline can revolutionize scuba diving. Divers can connect with each other and find each other quickly and reliably. Everyday there are reports of diver fatalities and injuries. Many go unreported. Help us bring this product to market that will change a human endeavor for the better. Your contribution is important and valuable.

Even if you cannot support us monetarily please spread the word about Diveline using the share tools on Indiegogo and also your social media. Every small action you make now counts towards returning a future diver home safely!

Perks

  • NavComAdopter: This is the personal unit. This unit will have the display and buttons. You need one for yourself and one for your buddy or boat for a basic set up. You can send messages between yourself and the buddy or other diver/boat. You can find your lost buddy or navigate back to the boat using the NavCom personal unit.
  • BeaconAdopter: This is the beacon unit that you can use to mark an object, location or boat. The beacon unit does not have a display and will have a fixed network address. The Navcom or the DiveLineBase can locate and navigate to the beacon unit.
  • DiveLineBaseAdopter: This the boat unit with dunking transducer. The boat unit will connect to a smart device such as an iPad via wifi. The smart device will run an app to send messages to divers as well as track them. On the Base unit Multiple divers can be tracked. The Base unit will show messages and you can find an individual diver or a Beacon.

The perks we offer in this round of funding are very special and will not be offered again. As an early adopter you get to trial the DiveLine NavCom first and provide helpful feedback. This feedback will be used to shape the final product. You will be making a valuable contribution. For this we offer a hefty 45% discount on RRP and an offer to replace the beta units with the final production units free of charge. You only have to pay for courier/postage costs. To show our appreciations even further for getting on board with us on this exciting journey we are offering a lifetime 20% off on any DiveLine products in the future (with a limit of 10 units per single customer per year for this discount). We will keep your name and address details on record.
story_txt:
Credentials
We have been in underwater wireless communications for more than seventeen years. We are global leaders in reliable underwater wireless communication. Our technology has been proven and utilized successfully in many sub-sea industries such as sub-sea oil and gas that demands high reliability and durability.  We come with unparalleled credentials to bring you a ground breaking and innovative product for Scuba and other diving pursuits.  Now we are miniaturizing this technology for the scuba diver. For more information about us see www.mydiveline.com and www.dspcomm.com
Testimonials for our core acoustic communication technology
Claude Cazaoulou, Acoustic Domain Manager, Thales Safare - France:
"Upon completing this evaluation, we found DSPComm's AquaComm modem was the only one to meet all our selection criteria. Most key to this decision for us was we could ensure we maintained our credibility and reputation with our customers for reliable, quality products. We have found DSPComm's Aquacomm product range to be more than capable in this regard"
 
Tim Waldby, Enviromental Systems Manager, MetOcean Engineers, Perth, Australia
"We concluded that DSPComm's Aquacomm modems fulfill our requirements of high underwater communications reliability, low power consumption and simple integration. We are now formalizing our integration plans and will commence manufacture and deployments over the coming months so that underwater wireless communications capability with our instruments are available off the shelf."
Read the full testimonials at:
http://www.dspcomm.com/company_testimonials.html

story:
Planned, orgnanized and curated by: 

Hristo Georgiev

What is it? 

FIRST EPIC TELERIKMAFIA TEAM BUILDING.

Where?

Bulgarian Seaside. 

When?

June 16 – June 18. We are leaving early on Friday morning, June 16.  All participants are encouraged to take Friday, June 16 as a day off from work if they decide to sign up. 

How do I sign up?

Just purchase the type of ticket that you desire. 

How do I get there?

By personal transportation ONLY.
